UI state management
Network debugging

Looking for a developer who can diagnose and fix this connection inconsistency so that successful socket connections are properly reflected in the UI, allowing users to send messages.

title: Update smart fee estimator in custom Dogecoin fork
description:
## Project Overview
I am looking for an experienced C++ blockchain developer to update the fee calculation logic in our custom fork of Dogecoin's codebase to be inline with modern Dogecoin. Our fork was adapted from a much older version of Dogecoin, and so we want you to implement the smart fee calculation and priority system of modern Dogecoin into our fork.

You can see our current code here:
This is the repository you will be modifying!
https://github.com/Flopcoin/Flopcoin

Here is the Dogecoin source code that contains the smart fee system we want:
You can copy over how the fee system works here!
https://github.com/dogecoin/dogecoin

Currently, the fee calculation functions (particularly in `wallet.cpp`) rely on deprecated or simplistic logic and a fee rate set to 1 FLOP/kB. We want to update our code to implement a more modern smart fee mechanism similar to the one used in modern Dogecoin forks when you can increase or lower the fee based on priority. Additionally, we need to change the fee rate from 1 FLOP/kB to 0.01 FLOP/kB (in line with modern dogecoin).

You will likely be modifying these files:
wallet.h, wallet.cpp, policy.h, policy.cpp

## Key Deliverables
1. Modernize Fee Estimation
   - Update the transaction creation loop in `wallet.cpp` to mimic the iterative fee estimation process described in the provided Dogecoin code.
   - Ensure that the fee is correctly iterated and adjusted until the transaction meets the network policy criteria.

2. Update Fee Calculation Functions
   - Modify the `GetMinimumFee` function in `wallet.cpp` to drop the old smart fee estimation (using mempool.estimateSmartFee) and instead use our internal function `GetRequiredFee`.
   - Update `GetRequiredFee` (or the equivalent function) to compute fees at a rate of 0.01 FLOP per kilobyte, instead of the current 1 FLOP/kB.

3. Testing and Validation
   - Thoroughly test the updated fee system to ensure that transactions are built correctly with the new fee rate.
   - Ensure that fee values comply with change output adjustments, coin selection, and all wallet policies.

4. Documentation  
   - Provide updated documentation or a guide on how the new fee mechanism works.
   - Create inline comments in the code to help future developers understand the changes.

5. Build Updated Wallets  
   - Compile and build the updated core wallets for Linux, Windows, and MacOS

## Required Skills
- Strong experience in C++ and blockchain development.
- Familiarity with cryptocurrency wallet implementations and transaction building.
- Previous experience working with Dogecoin or forking similar blockchain codebases.

## How to Apply
Please submit your proposal with:
- A brief description of your experience with similar projects.
- Your estimated timeline and cost for completing this project.
- Any further questions you have about the project!

title: Reverse Engineering File Upload Application
description:
We run a 3rd-party legacy application (on Windows) that polls a directory every 60 seconds for transaction files. If it finds a file, it uploads it to our server over the vendor's proprietary protocol. The 3rd-party application also has the ability to run "on demand" when a button is pressed in the interface.

Our issue is that this 60-second delay is not acceptable for our customers, as transactions are happening in-person and the server needs it immediately so the customer can pay and leave. If our system uploads a transaction, the legacy application will wait up to 60 seconds to ingest it into our POS system, causing the customer to wait/idle awkwardly.

We want to determine how the 3rd-party application uploading the file to our server, reverse engineering the protocol, and run the procedure when files appear immediately, rather than polling for new files every 60 seconds.

The 3rd party application is small (7KB EXE) and is not documented. No command line arguments are documented to see if it can just be run with extra flags.

Freelancer must be proficient in reverse engineering windows executables and networking.

description:

1. Description:
I need a backend developer to help set up APIs and queries for a Procurement Spend Dashboard. The data comes from ERP but for now we are using test data in Excel / CSV format, and we need a system to process, filter, and retrieve supplier spend insights.

2. Requirements:

âœ… API Development: Create endpoints to fetch spend data for front-end visualizations (charts, tables, maps).

âœ… Cross-Filtering Logic: Ensure filters apply dynamically across data sets.

âœ… Performance Optimization: Queries should run efficiently on large data sets.

3. Cloud-Ready Architecture:

The system will be hosted on AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud in the future.

APIs should be designed with scalability, serverless compatibility, and cloud database integration in mind.

4. Security Requirements:

Authentication: APIs should support JWT-based authentication for secure access.

Role-Based Access Control (RBAC): Different users (e.g., procurement manager, admin) should have different data access levels.

Data Protection: Queries should prevent SQL injection, and sensitive data (e.g., supplier details) should be encrypted where needed.

API Rate Limiting: To prevent abuse and ensure performance.

5. Tech Preferences (Preferred but Not Required):

Backend: Python (FastAPI, Flask, Django) or Node.js (Express).
Database: PostgreSQL, MySQL, or a cloud-native database (e.g., AWS RDS, Firestore).

Security: Experience implementing authentication, access control, and encryption.
ERP Data Handling: Experience working with large Excel/CSV files.

â³ 6. Timeline: Need first version within 1-2 weeks

If youâ€™ve worked on data-heavy dashboards, cloud deployments, or procurement-related projects, please share relevant experience. Looking forward to working with you!

title: Build a Live Performance Dashboard for TradingView Strategies with Trading Bot Integration
description:
I'm in need of a developer or company to create a live performance tracking dashboard that will track the performance of my companies tradingview strategies as well as have an automation option. We provide custom strategies for our users, and using TradingViews built in Strategy Backtester metrics, we want a dashboard that tracks that info straight to the dashboard interface. This dashboard would be giving real time trade performance information for every strategy, and there would be a ranking leaderboard for the most profitable strategies the last 7 days, 30 days, and 90 days. Besides the main dashboard itself, each strategy would need to be able to be clicked on to view more detailed strategy performance of each strategy. A user would then have the option to copy that strategy and automate it in a simple copy bot format.

Key requirements:

- We do not know how to integrate the backtest and live forward test performance metrics from TradingView, whether that be through API, webhooks, or web scraping - but we would want a developer that could figure that out.
- The user interface should provide a comprehensive overview of the performance metrics. A ranking leaderboard of the most profitable strategies for different time periods (7 days, 30 days, 90 days)
- Experience with TradingView and its API, Web Scraping, Webhooks.
- Proven track record in developing trading bots.
- Familiarity with the mentioned trading platforms.
- Strong programming skills, preferably in Python or JavaScript.
- Proficiency in web development with experience in creating interactive dashboards.
- A strong understanding of data visualization techniques.
- Prior experience working with TradingView or similar trading platforms is required.


PHASE 1 WOULD INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING:

- Strategy Performance Dashboard with Ranking Leaderboard of Strategies based on net profit % during certain time periods.
- Detailed Performance Page for each individual strategy from the dashboard.
- Admin Panel to add/edit/or remove TradingView strategies.
- Admin Panel to add/edit/ or remove users to use the dashboard platform.
- User Favorites page where users can view the strategies they have favorited from the dashboard. (only if we don't do phase 2)

TradingView Integrations
â€¢ Connect to TradingView backtesting data through API, webhooks, web scraping or however possible. (for live data, strategy tracking) Would need the developer to find the best solution for this.

PHASE 2 WOULD INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING:

Incorporating a Trading Bot (Copy Bot) into the strategy performance tracking dashboard.
Users would be able to select a strategy to automate and copy the signals from.
Would want the following exchanges broker included - Binance, Bybit, Coinbase, Robinhood, Tradovate, Tradestation, MetaTrader, Interactive Brokers.

- Creating the bot dashboard (simple, easy to use system for users)
- Connecting Exchanges/Brokers panel.
- Trade History panel
- User Live Trade Portfolio panel.

We were considering doing phase 1 first and then phase 2, but depending on cost and timeline of the project, we may decide to go ahead and do both 1 and 2 now.

Looking for a developer/team that we can rely on to work with for a very long time.

Will send a video that goes more in depth.

title: Full-Stack UI Developer (Fixed - Confidential Project)
description:
We are looking for an experienced Full-Stack UI Developer to build a secure, data-driven web application for a confidential proof of concept (PoC) project. This role involves developing an interactive dashboard with advanced data visualization, role-based access controls, and secure data handling techniques.

The ideal candidate should have expertise in React, Python (Flask/FastAPI), PostgreSQL, and AWS, along with experience in data security, anonymization (MD5/SHA1 hashing), and API integration.
Key Responsibilities:

    Develop a React-based UI with data visualization (charts, heatmaps, drill-down analytics).
    Build a secure backend using Python (Flask/FastAPI) and PostgreSQL.
    Implement data anonymization (MD5/SHA1 hashing) and role-based access control (RBAC).
    Deploy applications securely in AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS).
    Ensure compliance with best practices for handling sensitive data.

Required Skills & Experience:

â­ Experience with blockchain security, Power BI, fraud detection systems.

title: SaaS Development for Building Zoning and Code Compliance Information
description:
Backend / Full-Stack Developer for AI-Powered Zoning & Compliance Platform

We are re building an innovative search platform that helps architects and developers instantly access zoning laws, building codes, and compliance regulations. Our goal is to eliminate manual research and provide location-specific regulatory insights through a smart, AI-driven SaaS platform.

Who We are Looking For

Key Responsibilities
Dynamic Data Display â€“ Implement a rule-based system that hides or displays zoning details based on address-specific factors (e.g., earthquake regulations only for seismic zones, coastal rules only for coastal areas).
Data Aggregation & Processing â€“ Retrieve large datasets from various sources (APIs, PDFs) and process them into structured, searchable data.

title: Audi and Source Code Improvement
description:
I would like to recruit an expert web development provider with a specialization in the Symfony framework. The main mission will be to assess the existing source code, the development methods used, the overall performance of the application, and the quality of the code. The objective is to secure vulnerabilities and security flaws, to respect good Symfony coding practices and techniques, and to prevent potential bugs.

Missions and Responsibilities
1- Source Code Audit

* Analyze the existing source code to identify vulnerabilities and security flaws.

* Evaluate the quality of the code in terms of readability, maintainability, and compliance with Symfony coding standards.

* Identify possible bad development practices.

2- Performance Optimization

* Evaluate the overall performance of the application.

* Propose solutions to optimize loading times, SQL queries, and the use of server resources.

* Unit and functional testing integration

3- Security

* Identify and fix security vulnerabilities (SQL injections, XSS, CSRF, etc.).

* Implement additional security mechanisms if necessary.

* Ensure compliance with the latest security standards.

4- Compliance with Symfony Best Practices

* Check that the code complies with Symfony best practices and coding conventions.

* Suggest improvements to align the code with the latest versions of Symfony.

5- Bug Prevention

* Identify risk areas that could lead to bugs.

* Implement unit and functional tests to prevent regressions.

6- Documentation

* Write a detailed report of the analyses performed, the problems identified, and the proposed solutions.

* Provide technical documentation for the corrections and optimizations made.

7- Required Profile
- Technical Skills

* Advanced mastery of the Symfony 6 framework

* Proven experience in code auditing and performance optimization.

- In-depth knowledge of good security practices in web development.

* Experience in setting up unit and functional tests.

* Knowledge of code and performance analysis tools

8- Experience

* Minimum 7 years of experience in web development with Symfony.

* Experience in auditing and redesigning existing projects.

* Portfolio of similar projects successfully completed.

9- Soft Skills

* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

* Excellent communication, ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical people.

* Autonomy and rigor in work.

10- Expected Deliverables
- Audit Report

* Complete diagnosis of source code, performance, and security.

* List of identified vulnerabilities and recommendations to correct them.

- Optimized and Secured Code

* Corrected and optimized version of the source code.

* Implementation of unit and functional tests.

- Technical Documentation

* Detailed documentation of the modifications made.

11- Collaboration Terms
* Duration of the Mission: 15 days max

* Workplace: Teleworking possible, with regular videoconference meetings.

* The code will not be made available to you, I will give you access to a virtual machine allowing you to work quietly

title: Web Automation Engineer for Multi-Platform Data Monitoring System
description:
Project Overview:
We're developing a specialized data monitoring system that needs to regularly access and extract information from multiple third-party web platforms. The system will need to authenticate into various secure portals, navigate to specific areas, extract status information, and compile it into consolidated reports.

Technical Requirements:

Core Functionality:
Develop a web automation system that can access 5-7 different secure web portals
Create a process to extract specific status information from standardized locations within each portal
Compile extracted data into consolidated reports for easy review
Implement a user-friendly interface to initiate scans, view historical reports, and manage credentials

Technical Challenges:
Each target platform has a unique structure, login process, and data presentation format
The system must be resilient to changes in the target platforms' layouts and structures
Secure storage and handling of login credentials for multiple platforms
Building a system that can efficiently process multiple platforms within a reasonable timeframe

Technology Stack:
Containerized architecture for deployment (Docker)
Browser automation framework (Playwright/Puppeteer)
Web application for user interaction and reporting
Secure credential management system

Deliverables:
A complete MVP system supporting 5-7 target platforms
Admin interface for managing credentials and viewing reports
Documentation for maintaining and extending the system
Training on system operation and maintenance

Timeline
We're looking to complete an MVP within 1-3 months.

Ideal Candidate Skills
Strong experience with web automation and scraping complex authenticated portals
Experience building resilient systems that can handle target website changes
Knowledge of secure credential management best practices
Experience with containerization and cloud deployment
Strong problem-solving skills and adaptability

Project Details

Please include in your proposal:

Estimated timeline for completion
Pricing structure (fixed price or hourly rate)
Your approach to handling the unique challenges of this project
Examples of similar work you've done with complex web automation

We're looking for a developer who can work independently but communicate regularly about progress and challenges. The right candidate will demonstrate understanding of both the technical aspects and the security considerations of this type of system.

title: React & JSON Full Stack Developer for Responsive SaaS Platform
description:
SeniorThrive is a bold SaaS platform designed to empower older adults to thrive safely and independently at home. We're seeking an experienced React & JSON developer to collaborate directly with our founder and product lead to bring our vision to life. Our platform is primarily built on Supabase (Postgres) and leverages Google Cloud Platform for scalability, automation, and advanced AI capabilities, including Vision AI (Gemini).

Your Role:

Youâ€™ll play a pivotal role in refining, extending, and packaging our existing React-based frontend and JSON-driven backend integrations for launch. Your contributions will enhance the intuitive, responsive user experience tailored for older adults, families, and caregivers.

Key Responsibilities:

Collaborate in real-time (8 AM to 2 PM Los Angeles Time) with the product lead and founder.

Refine and optimize existing React components and JSON integrations (~80% of core development completed).

Manage backend interactions, leveraging Supabase (Postgres) and Google Cloud Platform for automation, scalability, and load balancing.

Implement and manage Auth0 authentication, including user management, social logins, and user metadata verification.

Integrate and optimize Google Vision AI for advanced home safety scans and personalized user recommendations.

Ensure optimal performance, scalability, and security of the SaaS platform.

Troubleshoot and resolve technical challenges to deliver a seamless user experience.

Requirements:

Proven expertise in React and JSON development.

Experience with backend services like Supabase (Postgres) in SaaS contexts.

Familiarity with Auth0 authentication, including social login integration.

Hands-on experience with Google Cloud Platform and Vision AI.

Strong collaborative skills and clear communication, with availability during specified core hours (8 AM to 2 PM Los Angeles Time).

Important Note:

We're looking for an individual developer who can work closely and directly with our small, dedicated team during core hours.

Please watch this brief video outlining our vision and current technical needs: https://www.loom.com/share/ce65f2d66a08436ea6529175793ae831?sid=1ecb117b-9ccf-44dd-bcd1-31d87e0472f4

Additionally, we'd appreciate your thoughtful responses to these questions:

Describe a React-based project where you refined existing code for a SaaS platform. What challenges did you encounter, and how did you overcome them?

Detail your experience with Supabase or similar backend systems in SaaS contexts.

How would you effectively integrate React components with JSON files to deliver responsive SaaS user experiences?

Share specific examples of responsive SaaS platforms you've developed, highlighting the integration of backend services like Supabase, Auth0, and Google Vision AI.

Join SeniorThrive and leverage your development skills to revolutionize aging at home through innovative, empowering technology solutions.

title: Senior Django Developer with Domain-Driven Design Experience
description:
Project description:
We're building Billify, a cash flow management platform for SMEs that centralizes financial data across multiple systems. We need an experienced Django developer with strong Domain-Driven Design skills to review and contribute to our invoice processing system.

About Billify:
Billify helps SMEs get real-time visibility into their cash position by integrating with accounting software (Yuki, Billit, Exact) and banking systems (Ponto). Our application uses a layered architecture following DDD principles, with a Django backend and React frontend.

Current challenge:
We've implemented invoice upload and processing functionality that extracts data from documents, stores files, and maintains invoice records. We require a thorough code review of our most recent PR, which implements our data stored in a relational database.

Required skills and experience:
â€” Multiple years of Django development experience
â€” Strong understanding of Domain-Driven Design and layered architecture
â€” Experience implementing clean interfaces between domain, application, and infrastructure layers
â€” Proficiency with PostgreSQL and Django ORM
â€” Experience with document processing (PDF parsing, metadata extraction)
â€” Understanding of file storage abstractions in web applications
â€” Ability to work within an established architecture while maintaining separation of concerns
â€” Excellent code review skills with attention to potential performance issues and maintainability

title: Adobe AEM Development of Custom Translation Service Provider
description:

The right candidate will:
- Use Docker and Docker Compose to make this code easy to recreate and run on my machine.

- What might need to change to fit into the AEM development lifecycle

description:
Job Overview:

title: Custom Page Development for Mix and Match Meat & Seafood Bundles
location: Only freelancers located in the U.S. may apply.
description:
We are looking for a skilled web developer to create a custom page on our Shopify website that allows users to mix and match selections of meat and seafood products. The page should be user-friendly, visually appealing, and should integrate smoothly with our existing site functionality. We currently use a bundling app that can be used for this purpose or if there is something better we can switch.

The page should walk the customer through some introductory questions like:
- how many people are you buying for?
- how many days a week do you eat out? We would calculate how many meals would be at home.
- Any allergies?
- Any proteins you specifically don't want?

Then the process goes through each category like beef, fish, chicken etc giving the customer a list of options.
With each selection it should prompt the customer to save with a purchase of multiples.
Once the total number of portions is met, there should be questions for upsell of other items.

title: Flask Developer Needed to Fix OAuth Session Persistence Issue
description:
Iâ€™m building a web app using Flask (backend) and React (frontend) that allows users to upload syllabi, extract events, and sync them with Google/Outlook Calendars.

Iâ€™m facing an issue with Flask session persistence after the OAuth login flow with Google. When the user logs in and is redirected back to my site, a new session is created, causing the app to lose stored credentials.

Issue Details:
- The Flask app is storing Google OAuth credentials in the session (session["google_credentials"]).
- After the OAuth login redirect (/google/callback), the session is lost and a new session file is created in the flask_session folder.
- Debugging confirms:
   - Cookies are enabled and being set in the browser.
   - Session data exists before redirect but disappears after.
session.keys() only shows ["_permanent"] after the redirect.
- I have tried setting:
   - SESSION_COOKIE_SAMESITE = "None"
   - SESSION_COOKIE_SECURE = True
   - SESSION_TYPE = "filesystem"
- Issue persists despite these fixes.

Project Details:
- Backend: Flask (Python)
- Frontend: React (JavaScript)
- Auth Flow: Google OAuth 2.0
- Session Management: Flask-Session (filesystem-based)
- Hosting: Local development for now (planning for deployment)

Deliverables:
- Diagnose and fix the session persistence issue.
- Ensure session["google_credentials"] is retained after the redirect.
- Provide a clear explanation of the fix so I can implement it in the future.
- Verify Google Calendar API authentication works properly.

Ideal Candidate:
- Flask + OAuth 2.0 expertise (especially Google OAuth)
- Strong understanding of Flask-Session and cookie behavior
- Experience debugging session persistence issues
- Familiarity with React + Flask integrations (bonus)
- Clear communicator who can explain the fix

If you have fixed a similar OAuth session issue before, please mention your experience and how you plan to approach the fix.

Looking forward to working with you!

description:

- Experience with audio streaming optimization is a big plus.
- Knowledge of CMS integration (WordPress, Webflow, or similar) and how to manage content separately from a web app.
- Strong communication skills and the ability to provide clear recommendations for implementation.

Next Steps

title: Website Developer (Shopify Focus)
description:
**Job Posting: Shopify Frontend & Backend Developer (E-commerce Optimization)**  
**Location:** Remote  
**Type:** Contractual with Monthly Retainer  
**Hours:** 2 hours/month for routine updates and maintenance, with additional hours as needed for major updates or optimizations.  
**Compensation:** Competitive hourly rate, to be discussed.  

**About Otherworlds Inc.:**  
Otherworlds Inc. is a creative studio pioneering immersive storytelling in fantasy, sci-fi, and cosmic horror. Our work spans video games, comics, novels, and merchandise, all designed to engage audiences in rich, generational narratives. As we expand our digital marketplace, we need an experienced **Shopify Developer** who can optimize and enhance our online storefront without relying on excessive plugins.  

**Position Overview:**  
Weâ€™re looking for a **Shopify Developer** with deep expertise in both **frontend and backend coding** to refine and maintain our Shopify-based e-commerce store. The ideal candidate understands Shopifyâ€™s native Liquid code, can write custom scripts, optimize performance, and implement custom functionalities **without breaking site stability**.  

**Key Responsibilities:**  
- **Custom Shopify Development:** Write clean, efficient code in **Liquid, JavaScript, and CSS** to enhance Shopifyâ€™s native functionality.  
- **Theme Customization & Performance Optimization:** Modify themes and templates to improve UX/UI while ensuring fast load times and mobile responsiveness.  
- **Plugin Reduction & Optimization:** Remove unnecessary third-party apps by replacing them with **custom-coded solutions** to enhance site efficiency.  
- **Backend Development:** Optimize **Shopify's API, custom scripts, and database structures** to improve site performance and scalability.  
- **Checkout & Cart Enhancements:** Customize Shopifyâ€™s checkout process (within Shopify Plus limitations) to streamline user experience.  
- **SEO & Speed Optimization:** Implement best practices for Shopify SEO and ensure the site loads efficiently.  
- **Security & Maintenance:** Monitor site performance, fix bugs, and implement security patches without disrupting operations.  

**Qualifications:**  
- **Extensive Shopify Experience:** Proven track record working with Shopifyâ€™s backend (Liquid) and frontend (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).  
- **Coding Proficiency:** Strong understanding of Shopify's **Liquid, JSON, JavaScript (Vanilla & jQuery), HTML, and CSS/SASS**.  
- **API Integration Skills:** Experience with Shopify API and third-party integrations.  
- **Performance Optimization:** Ability to reduce reliance on third-party plugins through **custom coding**.  
- **Problem-Solving & Debugging:** Experience troubleshooting and fixing site issues **without breaking core functionality**.  
- **Strong Communication & Documentation Skills:** Ability to explain technical challenges clearly and document custom solutions.  

**Bonus Skills (Preferred but not Required):**  
- **Shopify Plus Experience** (checkout extensibility and API handling).  
- **Experience with Subscription Models** (Recharge, Bold, or custom-built solutions).  
- **Headless Shopify Development** (GraphQL and React/Next.js integrations).  
- **Experience with E-commerce Analytics & CRO (Conversion Rate Optimization).**  

**Communication & Workflow:**  
- Our team communicates via **Discord** for project updates and file sharing.  
- We prefer **asynchronous work** with clear documentation of changes.  

**How to Apply:**  
Interested candidates should submit:  
- A **resume** showcasing relevant Shopify experience.  
- A **cover letter** detailing past Shopify projects and your approach to plugin optimization.  
- Links to **Shopify stores** you have built or optimized.  
- Expected **hourly rate** and availability.  

Join **Otherworlds Inc.** and help us build a **seamless, high-performance e-commerce experience** for our growing community of creators and fans.  

Learn more about us at **[Otherworldsinc.com](https://otherworldsinc.com)** and follow us on social media for updates!

title: Custom Quiz w/ Custom Answer Outcome
description:
We built out a typeform (attached below) in which we are building a quiz with custom scoring. This is for client onboarding to show what products they qualify for. At the end of the quiz, I need it to analyze all of the program scores and display the end result of the highest score as the suggestion.

You can go through the quiz as a test to understand questions and type. It's simple, I'm considering Involve.me and Formstack. I'm not tied to one or the other, I just like the look of the typeform below. If someone can replicate and create the custom scoring, you have the job.

title: Work Order Scan Front End improvements
description:
Project Overview
We are looking for an experienced developer to build a document scanning and editing feature within our SaaS-based fleet management platform. This feature will enable fleet managers to upload, scan, and edit work orders, invoices, and maintenance records with high accuracy and efficiency. The goal is to provide an intuitive interface where users can click on the document to highlight corresponding fields in the form, and vice versa (similar to Nanonets).
The front-end should align with the UX/UI standards of modern SaaS applications, ensuring a seamless, structured workflow for processing scanned work orders. The system should handle large document sets efficiently, validate extracted data, and provide a guided review process for error correction.

https://app.nanonets.com/ is a great example app that does this well. Here is a video showing it:
https://www.loom.com/share/f5aa28ec26e54da49e9ea191f4b1b904

Technical Scope
Document Upload & Processing
File Upload UI:
Drag-and-drop and direct file selection.
Show a real-time progress bar during upload.
Validate file formats and display a preview before submission.
OCR & Data Extraction:
Extract key fields from work orders, invoices, and maintenance logs (e.g., date, vendor, part details, labor costs, total amounts).
Implement error handling and detailed feedback for missing or incorrectly parsed fields.

Interactive Editing & Validation
Two-way document interaction:
Clicking a field in the document highlights the corresponding field in the form, and vice versa.
Allow inline editing of all extracted values.
Editable fields include cost, quantity, unit price, markup, and descriptions.
Bounding Box Coordination:
Each extracted field is visually outlined in the document with a bounding box.
When a user selects a field in the form, the corresponding bounding box in the document is highlighted for better visibility.
Users can drag and resize bounding boxes to correct OCR misalignment if needed.
Implement real-time field linking where adjustments in the bounding box automatically update the extracted value in the form.
Ensure bounding boxes adapt dynamically for multi-page documents and various font styles.
Guided Validation & Review:
Introduce a step-by-step verification process with collapsible sections for labor, parts, and total costs.
Users must check off each section before submitting.
Error-checking bubbles should provide inline hints for verification.
Zoom & Navigation Improvements:
A hand tool should allow smooth movement inside the zoomed document (instead of using scroll bars).
Ensure smooth scrolling behavior where the left panel (document preview) remains fixed, while the right panel (form) scrolls independently.

Expected Deliverables
âœ… Fully functional document scanning & editing tool integrated into the fleet management platform.
âœ… User-friendly UI/UX for uploading, validating, and editing scanned work orders.
âœ… Real-time interactive editing between scanned documents and form fields.
âœ… Optimized OCR pipeline that minimizes scan time while maintaining accuracy.
âœ… Guided walkthrough validation process with collapsible sections and inline hints.



Skills Required
ðŸŸ¢ Frontend: React.js, Ant Design (preferred), modern UI frameworks.
ðŸŸ¢ Backend: Node.js, Python (for OCR/AI processing), SQL (PostgreSQL/MySQL).
ðŸŸ¢ File Processing: PDF/image parsing, error handling, validation

Project Milestones & Timeline
ðŸ“Œ Developer to provide a quote and estimated timeline for completion.
ðŸ“Œ Proposal should outline:
Relevant experience in document processing apps.
Past projects with document parsing and interactive UI design.
Estimated timeline & budget for completion.

Next Steps
Interested developers should submit a proposal with:
Previous experience with OCR, document parsing, and interactive form design.
Approach for improving scanning speed & UI usability.
Proposed budget & development timeline.
We are excited to collaborate on this AI document scanning and editing tool!

title: Co-Founder & CTO for AI x Web3 Startup
description:
**About Acronym AI**  
Acronym AI is pioneering the next evolution of automation by integrating AI, Web2, and Web3 into a unified intelligence layer. Our platform eliminates complexity, allowing users to automate financial strategies, optimize workflows, and seamlessly interact with digital ecosystems. By bridging AI, blockchain, and traditional web services, Acronym AI is creating autonomous technology that works for you, with you, and without you.  

Weâ€™re looking for a **Co-Founder & Chief Technology Officer (CTO)** to lead the technical vision and help shape the future of Acronym AI. This is a rare opportunity to join an early-stage, high-impact project, with the potential to become a key voice in the AI x Web3 revolution.  

---

### **Role & Responsibilities**  
As the Co-Founder & CTO, you will:  
- **Lead Technical Development** â€“ Oversee the integration of AI models, Web2 automation, and Web3 interoperability.  
- **Public Representation** â€“ Occasionally speak on podcasts, livestreams, and video-recorded content to share the vision and technology behind Acronym AI.  
- **Community & Ecosystem Engagement** â€“ Engage with developers, users, and the broader AI/Web3 space through public platforms.  
- **Collaboration & Strategy** â€“ Work alongside the founding team to refine product-market fit, technical execution, and long-term growth.  

---

### **Qualifications**  
We are looking for someone who:  
- Has **strong AI expertise** â€“ Deep understanding of LLMs, RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation), and AI orchestration.  
- Understands **crypto fundamentals** â€“ Comfortable with Web3, wallets, smart contracts, and DeFi (advanced knowledge is a plus).  
- Is a **confident communicator** â€“ Can clearly explain technical concepts in public-facing content.  
- Is familiar with **Web2 & Web3 ecosystems** â€“ Experience with APIs, automation tools, and blockchain integrations is preferred.  
- Thrives in **startup environments** â€“ Comfortable working with lean teams and evolving roadmaps.  

---

### **Compensation & Hiring Process**  
Weâ€™re offering an initial **1-month trial phase**, with a flexible workload:  
- **15 hours per month**  
- Paid weekly upfront  
- If successful â†’ **1-year contract** at 20 hours per month + **2% token equity**  

---

If youâ€™re passionate about AI, automation, and Web3, and youâ€™re ready to help shape the future of intelligent technology, we encourage you to apply through this platform.

We are building CareMatch, a caregiver connection platform that combines the job-search functionality of Care.com with the swipe-based simplicity of Tinder. The goal is to connect caregivers with families, patients, and healthcare providers through an intuitive matching system.

This job is perfect for a Bubble.io expert who can develop a fully functional MVP  with essential features and API integrations. We are starting from scratch in Bubble.io, so the ideal candidate can design, build, and optimize workflows efficiently.

ðŸ”‘ Key Features
1ï¸âƒ£ Swipe-Based Matching (Tinder-Style)

title: WordPress Developer for SSO Integration with Matrix Server
description:
Weâ€™re looking for an experienced WordPress developer to help integrate our website with a Matrix server via Single Sign-On (SSO). The task will involve configuring the WP Auth Plugin to authenticate users for both our website and the Matrix server. Once the configuration is done, we will provide the relevant details to our matrix hosting provider (etke.cc) to enable SSO on the Matrix side.

Key Responsibilities:
configure the WP Auth Plugin on our WordPress website.
Provide the necessary Client ID, Client Secret, and Redirect URI for the SSO configuration.
Coordinate with the etke.cc team by providing them with all required details to enable the SSO setup on the Matrix server (this will not involve manual configuration on the server itself, as etke manages that part).
Ensure that the configuration works seamlessly for users accessing both the website and Matrix services.
Skills & Experience Required:
Strong experience with WordPress, especially WP Auth Plugin and SSO integrations.
Familiarity with OAuth2 and SSO concepts.
Ability to communicate effectively and coordinate with external teams (etke.cc) to ensure smooth integration.

title: Cloud Database Developer for NetSuite & Website Integration
description:
Project Overview
We  are seeking an experienced Cloud Database Developer to build and integrate a scalable cloud database that synchronizes NetSuite, vendor data, and our company website. The ideal candidate will have expertise in cloud database architecture, API development, and NetSuite integration to ensure seamless automation and data flow.

Additionally, We are open to evaluating pre-built cloud-based platforms that can fulfill the same needs with existing tools. The developer will be responsible for assessing whether an off-the-shelf solution (such as Unleashed Software, Coupa, or DCKAP) could be integrated efficiently, or if a fully custom solution is required.

Scope of Work

1. Cloud Database Development (Custom Build Option)

Design and implement a cloud-based database (AWS RDS, Google Cloud SQL, or similar).

Structure data to store vendor parts, inventory data, and drop-ship availability.

Implement data validation and cleaning rules to ensure consistency across vendors.

2. Pre-Built Cloud Platform Evaluation (Alternative Approach)

Research and recommend existing SaaS platforms that handle vendor management, NetSuite integration, and website data syncing.

Assess feasibility and cost comparison between a custom-built cloud database vs. a pre-built SaaS solution.

If a SaaS platform is selected, handle custom integration and API development to fit AMS Partsâ€™ requirements.

3. NetSuite Integration

Develop API connections to sync vendor parts data into NetSuite while protecting inventory records.

Enable two-way sync where NetSuite updates (new parts, inventory levels) reflect in the cloud database or pre-built solution.

Automate import processes for vendor-provided part lists (CSV, Excel, or API feeds).

4. Website Synchronization

Build an API that allows the website to pull live data from the cloud database or SaaS solution.

Ensure website updates include part availability, descriptions, and compatibility information in real-time.

Optimize performance for fast queries and reliable uptime. Eventually we would like to move into ecommerce platform such as Suite commerce or Big Commerce.

5. Error Handling & Reporting

Implement automated checks for duplicate records, missing part descriptions, and pricing mismatches.

Develop an admin dashboard for our team members to review and correct flagged errors before syncing data.

Ideal Candidate Skills & Experience

Cloud Database Management: Experience with AWS RDS, Google Cloud, Firebase, or similar.

API Development & Integration: Proficiency in RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and webhooks.

NetSuite Customization: Knowledge of SuiteScript 2.0, SuiteTalk API, or similar for seamless integration.

Data Processing & ETL: Experience in handling large-scale data imports and transformations.

E-commerce & Website Data Sync: Familiarity with website backend development and performance optimization.

SaaS Evaluation & Integration: Experience working with pre-built ERP, inventory, or supply chain management platforms.

Project Details

Contract Type: Fixed-price or hourly (please provide estimates in your proposal). As well as possible time frame to build.

Budget: Open to quotes based on expertise and project scope.

Start Date: ASAP.

How to Apply

Interested candidates should submit a proposal including:

Relevant experience with cloud databases, SaaS solutions, and NetSuite integrations.

Examples of past projects where they built similar API-driven data sync solutions or integrated pre-built platforms.

Technical approach to handling vendor data, inventory sync, and website updates.

Estimated timeline & budget quote.

We are looking for a highly skilled developer to create an efficient, scalable, and automated data synchronization system. Whether this involves a fully custom build or leveraging an existing SaaS, we seek a solution that best fits our long-term needs. If you have the expertise and experience please let us know similar projects you have completed. We look forward to working with you!

title: Software Developer Needed for Mobile and Web App Functionality
description:
**Job Description:**

We are looking for a motivated software developer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and implementing a specific functionality that will be seamlessly integrated into both our mobile and web applications. This new feature is crucial for enhancing user experience and ensuring that our applications meet the evolving needs of our customers.

**Functionality**
The user should be accessing the functionality without specific login forms or other authentication means. The feature should be part of the app, both visually and as an experience.
Upon opening the app section denominated *Community* the user should be presented with a list of contents (i.e. articles) coming from a database. These articles should by default be presented in a chronological order, from the newest to the oldest.
The list should include a small image, the title and a brief text excerpt from the article itself
The user should be able to search articles, through a standard search feature, as well as filtering. Common filters are expected (date, tags, views, interactions etc).
The user should be able to click on one article and open the entire article in a dedicated view.
At the bottom of the article a section should be present to allow for comments and reaction on the article itself. The user should be able to post comments, interact with other comments and post reactions. The user should be identified in the comments section using the profile information of the parent app.

**Development**
During the development phase of the feature it is expected from the developer to maintain a reasonable communication with the engineering team of the commissioner. This will include updates on the development and check ins for validation with the QA responsible. These information rounds will ideally happen every 48hrs, but shorter cycles are also welcome.
The feature will be considered complete when it meets the aforementioned requirements and can be presented in working conditions.

title: Create New Python Library that makes use of datadog-api-client
description:
This is purely python library without frontend/rest work. You can/recommended to extensively make use of LLM with VSCode with clone/roo IDE ( LLM credits will be provided) , basically 80% of the code can be generated through LLM. In this task, we want to create a python based library that basically ingests data from datadog using datadog-api-client and then writes it to the Database ( Using django-ORM library). You need to write integration tests to validate the functionality.  Please expect rigorous code reviews, and changes need to go through PRs.

There are multiple functionalities that needs to be developed:
Milestone 1:
1. Ingest all dashboards/watchers using the Python API Client  . And Process them using the provided library/class, and then write that data to a table in  DB.
2. Now in another class, read all of this data written in # 1 or use Another API. And for each data point, process it through datadog-api  and write the results back to the table.
3. Orchestrate Both #1 and # 2 : Basically calling #1 and then #2 and then write the aggregation of it to the DB.
4. Update Datadog api for each of the row in # 1.    

Milestone 2:

1. We will ingest all the hosts data to DB
2.  Expose some methods that gives insights into this data.
     -  The # of instances that belong to certain instance type.
     -  # of instances that belong to given tags
    -  List of all tags and instance types used by hosts.

Milestone 3:
Get all spans info.  process them. Method to remove spans


ChatGPT O3 model access will be provided. But, You are to use your expertise to complement it

title: Developer Needed to Build Instagram CRM SaaS with AI & Licensing System
description:
We are looking for a highly skilled developer to build an Instagram CRM platform that will allow users to:

ðŸ”¹ Instagram API Integration
Use Instagram's official Public API to connect accounts, manage messages, schedule content, and track analytics.

ðŸ”¹ AI-Powered Auto-Responses

title: Currency Converter Ruby on Rails
description:
We are looking for an experienced Ruby on Rails Developer to build a Currency Converter Web Application with multi-language support and automatic language detection. The ideal candidate should have expertise in Rails I18n, API integrations, and geolocation services.

Key Features & Requirements:

1. Currency Conversion Functionality

A form to input the amount for conversion.

Dropdowns for selecting "From" and "To" currencies.

Fetch real-time exchange rates using an external API (e.g., Open Exchange Rates, Fixer.io â€“ free tier for testing).

Display the converted amount with appropriate error handling.


2. Localization & Multi-Language Support (Rails I18n)

Implement Rails I18n to support multiple languages (English, French, Spanish, German, Arabic, etc.).

Store translations in YAML files (e.g., config/locales/en.yml, config/locales/fr.yml).

A dropdown to manually switch languages, updating the UI dynamically.

Store the userâ€™s language preference in session/local storage for persistence.


3. Automatic Language Detection (Geolocation)

Use the Geocoder gem to detect the userâ€™s country based on their IP address.

Automatically set the UI language based on the detected country.

Fallback to English if the detected language is not supported.


4. UI & Error Handling

Display flag icons in currency selection dropdowns.

Ensure language selection updates dynamically without requiring a page refresh.

Implement user-friendly error handling for API failures or invalid inputs.

Responsive UI with ERB/HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.


Technology Stack:

Backend: Ruby on Rails

Frontend: ERB, HTML, CSS, JavaScript

Localization: Rails I18n (or any preferred method)

Geolocation: Geocoder gem

Currency Exchange API: Open Exchange Rates / Fixer.io (for free testing)

title: Rentify Customization : WEB + APP + VENDOR / ADMIN DASHBOARD
description:
Rentify Customization : WEB + APP + VENDOR / ADMIN DASHBOARD
Project Brief: Rentify Customization for Car Rental System
FULL SPECS ATTACHED

PLEASE ONLY BID IF YOU IF BUDGET+TIMELINE OK FOR YOU.

Overview:
Hello i am assessing my options currently on how to develop this website, that is why you can see another project opened with the same specs.

I am looking for a freelancer to customize the Rentify car rental solution to meet our specific business requirements. The project involves adapting both the UI and backend processes of the existing Rentify system. Key customizations include modifications to user, vendor, and admin workflows, particularly around booking and payment processes.
RENTIFY SYSTEM : https://codecanyon.net/item/rentify-online-car-rental-booking-system-full-solution/49916472

Scope of Work:

UI/UX Customization:

Adapt the current Rentify UI to align with our branding and context.
Modify layouts on both mobile and web interfaces as needed.
User Module Enhancements:

Customize user registration to include additional fields and document uploads (e.g., driving license, ID/passport).
Implement an approval process for new user registrations before booking is enabled.
Booking & Payment Workflow:

Modify the booking process to capture additional details (e.g., delivery location, booking time, driving license number).
Customize payment functionality to process a 10% deposit initially, with the balance due at pickup.
Develop automated email triggers listing owner payment options upon deposit confirmation.
Dashboard Customization:

Ensure separate dashboards for vendors (car owners) and admins.
Enhance vendor dashboard to include fleet management, subscription package details, and booking history.
Expand admin dashboard to include user/owner validation, fleet approval, comprehensive booking oversight, and detailed reporting.
Technology & Framework Requirements:

Mobile App: Flutter, Dart, Java/Kotlin, Objective-C/Swift
Web Back-End: PHP, JavaScript, Laravel
Web Front-End: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery
Timeline & Budget:

Timeline: 10-12 days for project completion
Budget: $250 USD
Additional Information:
Phase 1 Project Setup Ui Customisation/Rebranding
I would need the awarded freelancer to start right away by loading the web app to VPS. A first call to be done with freelancer to go over UI changes needed. I will then provide a document with UI changes needed for freelancer to start at his convenience.


This project is based on the Rentify solution available on CodeCanyon and appdevs.cloud.
The freelancer should be experienced in customizing pre-built systems and integrating new functionalities while ensuring smooth UI/UX transitions.
Open communication is expected to clarify requirements and adjust scope if needed within the stated budget and timeline.

title: Mobile App Specialist Needed for iOS and Android
description:
We are seeking a skilled mobile app expert to address and resolve security vulnerabilities in our Android and iOS applications. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in fixing the issues below.
Here are the exact issues you will have to address, not all may need code change. We'll also tell you how to fix these issues. I need someone to actually fix these.

APK-01: Janus Vulnerability
APK-02: Token Found in XML File (File System Storage)
APK-03: Sensitive Data in Logs (Token Present)
APK-04: Sensitive Data in URLs (Token Visible in Auto-Login)
APK-05: Improper Session Expiration (No Session Expiration)
APK-06: Token Replay Attacks Possible (Token Can Be Replayed)
APK-07: Missing HttpOnly Flag (Cookies Accessible via JavaScript)
APK-08: SameSite=None on Cookies (Potential CSRF Risk)
Private and Confidential: Limited Circulation

APK-09: No Root/Jailbreak Detection (Device Not Protected Against
Rooting/Jailbreaking
APK-10: App Can Be Installed on Vulnerable, Unpatched Android Versions
APK-11: Backup Issues Identified (Backup is Enabled)
APK-12: Insecure Hashing Algorithm MD5 Used
APK-13: Insecure Hashing Algorithm SHA-1 Used
APK-14: Message Authentication Code (MAC) is Configured with HmacMD5
APK-15: Unvalidated URL Opening (android.intent.action.VIEW)
APK-16: Insecure CALL_PHONE Permission
APK-17: Application Does Not Check for Updates
IPA-01: Insecure Cookie Storage
IPA-02: Insecure API Usage (_fopen, _memcpy, _printf, _sscanf)
IPA-03: Binary Not Encrypted
IPA-04: Missing Frida Detection in iOS Application
IPA-05: Jailbreak Detection Bypass
IPA-06: Runpath Search Path Vulnerability (@rpath)
IPA-07: Debug Symbols Available
IPA-08: Improper Certificate Validation
IPA-09: Exposed Google API Key in Application

title: NetSuite Developer with SuiteScript Expertise Needed
description:
About Us

We are a growing NetSuite consulting company that helps businesses optimize and extend their NetSuite ERP functionality. Our team specializes in custom NetSuite solutions, including SuiteScript development, integrations, workflows, saved searches, and automation. We are looking for a highly skilled and reliable NetSuite Developer to join us on a long-term, freelance basis for approximately 25 hours per week.

Job Description

As a NetSuite Developer, you will work closely with our team to develop, enhance, and maintain NetSuite customizations. The ideal candidate should have strong experience in SuiteScript (1.0 & 2.x), integrations (REST/SOAP), workflows, and NetSuite administration.

Responsibilities
-Develop and maintain SuiteScript 1.0 & 2.x scripts for custom functionality
-Build and optimize NetSuite fields, forms, saved searches, and custom records
-Integrate NetSuite with third-party applications using RESTlets, SuiteTalk (SOAP), and other APIs

title: ElizaOS Expert
description:
We are seeking a ElizaOS expert to join our team on a short-term project. Our ideal candidate is someone who truly understands ElizaOS and can deliver high-quality, reliable work.

After a previous experience where a self-proclaimed expert ended in a dispute after just eight hours, we need someone who can demonstrate proven expertise and strong accountability!

Project Overview
Our current setup includes a basic running agent built from a character file. Your primary responsibility will be to extend this agent with a new ElizaOS plugin. This plugin should:

1) Database Integration & Learning:
Read messages from our database, learn from them, and evolve the agent over time. The agent must be capable of understanding conversation topics and tracking who has discussed what.

2) Website Content Embedding:
Seamlessly integrate and continuously update content from our markdown-based Docusaurus website. The plugin should fetch the latest updates (potentially reading from a few directories down in the Docusaurus folder) to ensure the agent always reflects current information.

While these features exist within ElizaOS, we only need your expertise to connect them effectively and to propose additional improvements that enhance overall functionality.

Please share your previous ElizaOS projects and real-world examples that showcase your capability to deliver under these requirements.

We don't allow manual logging, and we track and review the code you write. Therefore, you must push your code to our GitHub repository every few hours.

if youâ€™re confident in your skills with ElizaOS and can meet our standards for quality and accountability, weâ€™d love to hear from you.

Our preference is for a fixed-price arrangement, so if you can offer that, it would greatly simplify our decision-making process.

title: Freelancer Needed: Website Performance Optimization (WordPress + Divi + Hostinger + Cloudflare)
description:
READ: Don't apply if you are going to try to use a caching plug-in to cover-up the issues.  Also, don't apply if you want to sell me on this taking days and weeks to fix to get more hours.  I can show you how to fix this in the allocated timeframe.  See below and attached pagespeed insights and pingdom report. You can also pull a gtmetrix.

Here's a detailed job post you can use to hire a freelancer to fix your website's performance issues.  

---

### **Freelancer Needed: Website Performance Optimization (WordPress + Divi + Hostinger + Cloudflare)**  

We are looking for an experienced web developer to optimize our WordPress website built with **Divi** and hosted on **Hostinger**. We use **Cloudflare CDN** (which has been purged) and the **LiteSpeed Cache plugin**, but we need to fix **the root cause** of our **page and image loading issues**, not just rely on caching plugins.  

#### **Project Overview**  
Our website has **page speed issues** affecting user experience and SEO. Our **Pingdom, GTmetrix, and PageSpeed Insights** reports highlight issues related to **HTML, CSS, and JavaScript**, which we need to fix.  

**Key Metrics (PageSpeed Insights on Mobile, Slow 4G, Moto G Power Emulation):**  
- **First Contentful Paint (FCP):** 3.0s  
- **Largest Contentful Paint (LCP):** 5.2s  
- **Total Blocking Time (TBT):** 120ms  
- **Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS):** 0.509  
- **Speed Index:** 4.0s  

### **What Needs to Be Fixed?**  
We need a developer who can **directly optimize our site** by working on:  

#### **1. Image Optimization (Prevent LCP & CLS Issues)**  
- Ensure **all images have explicit width and height attributes** to prevent layout shifts.  
- Fix **"media element lacking an explicit size"** errors.  
- Implement **lazy loading properly** while maintaining image dimensions.  
- Use **CSS object-fit: cover/contain** to prevent distortion.  

#### **2. Reduce Unused JavaScript & CSS**  
- Identify and remove **unused JavaScript (potential savings: 146 KB)**.  
- Reduce **unused CSS (potential savings: 18 KB)**.  
- Avoid **serving legacy JavaScript** to modern browsers (9 KB savings).  
- Optimize **JavaScript execution and defer unnecessary scripts** to improve FCP/LCP.  

#### **3. Improve Render & Loading Performance**  
- **Fix CLS issues** related to shifting elements, including **Divi modules, carousel images, and navigation elements**.  
- **Minimize HTTP requests** and optimize the **critical rendering path**.  
- Address **long main-thread tasks** and **avoid chaining critical requests**.  
- Serve **static assets with an efficient cache policy** (29 resources identified).  
- **Enable Gzip compression** (F23) to reduce response times by 70%.  

#### **4. Fix Layout & UI Issues**  
- Improve **accessibility** by fixing **contrast issues, navigation order, and viewport settings**.  
- Ensure **consistent heading structure** (h1, h2, h3 should not skip levels).  
- Fix **buttons and text contrast issues** for better readability.  

### **Requirements**  
âœ… Strong expertise in **HTML, CSS, and JavaScript**  
âœ… Experience with **WordPress, Divi, and Hostinger**  
âœ… Familiarity with **Cloudflare, CDN optimization, and LiteSpeed Cache**  
âœ… Ability to **debug layout shifts and fix core web vitals issues without relying on plugins**  
âœ… Strong understanding of **PageSpeed Insights, Lighthouse, GTmetrix, and Pingdom**  

**Bonus Skills:**  
âž• Experience with **WebP images, modern script deployment, and reducing third-party script dependencies**  
âž• Familiarity with **Chrome DevTools for code coverage analysis**  

### **How to Apply**  
Please send us:  
1ï¸âƒ£ A brief overview of your experience with **WordPress performance optimization**.  
2ï¸âƒ£ Examples of similar **speed optimization projects** you've completed.  
3ï¸âƒ£ Your estimated **timeline and pricing**.  

We want **real fixes** to the core issues, not just another plugin solution. If you're confident in optimizing our site at the code level, we'd love to hear from you! ðŸš€

title: SaaS - Add Feature: Cut Long Video into Short Clips w/AI (Cheaply)
description:
I have an existing SaaS app that I'm building. It does everything I need it to do like captions / subtitles, etc.

I now want to add a feature that ingests a long video (assume 1 hour) and identifies the viral %10% best clips and cuts them into short vids for Tiktok, Reels, YT Shorts, etc.

Therefore, the logic must be SMART enough to figure out which parts of the long video are worth cutting.

** IF YOU HAVE DONE THIS BEFORE, THEN YOU ARE THE PERSON I WANT TO WORK WITH. **

We obviously use:
- NodeJS / Next JS
- FFmpeg
- Remotion
- OpenAI or other AI LLM to do the identification and cutting.

** IF YOU HAVE DONE THIS BEFORE, THEN YOU ARE THE PERSON I WANT TO WORK WITH. **

REQUIREMENTS:
----
1) DELIVERABLE - You present me with working flow. You get paid and a great review.

2) SOLUTION & COST PER VIDEO PROCESSED (cost per video rendering) - the solution must be cheap to create a video -- obviously if it costs $5 to cut a single video, it's NOT marketable. I'm looking for a solution that can get such videos renderered in cents.

3) SMART SELECTION OF CLIPS & CUTTING - the clips chosen by the AI must make sense and be the best clips of the video. Obviously. we can't be perfect all the time but you shouldn't have basic issues like cutting off the voice mid-sentence, choosing completely irrelevant clips, etc.

4) TECH STACK - Must use our tech stack as this feature will be bolted on to an existing app that is built on NodeJS (back-end), NextJS (frontend), MongoDB (database), and Redis for caching. We already use FFmpeg which you will need.

5) TIMELINE - Want this done within 2 weeks or less.

6) COMMENTED CODE - well structured, clean, commented code so that my dev can easily bolt it on to my app.


SIMILAR TOOLS:
They all follow the same simple user flow so there's not much room for misunderstanding.

1) Opus - opus.pro -- model after this one! PLEASE TRY IT TO SEE THE END GOAL.
2) Capcut - https://www.capcut.com/editor-tools/long-video-to-shorts
3) Veed - https://www.veed.io/tools/auto-video-editor/ai-clip-generator
4) Minvo - https://minvo.pro/
5) Klap - https://klap.app/
6) QuickReel - https://www.quickreel.io/

Anyone who can prove they've done this before, or similar functionality, will be given first preference. SHOW ME, DON'T TELL ME.

title: Fix Shopify & GA4 Tracking Issues
description:
We are looking for an experienced developer to troubleshoot and resolve tracking issues with our Shopify store and Google Analytics 4 (GA4). Currently, the tracking is not functioning as expected, leading to discrepancies in our analytics data. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of Shopify's platform and GA4 setup.

We run Google ads, Microsoft ads, Meta ads and also have Cookiebot set up through GTM.

There are two parts to this project.

The first is that our GA4 has some tracking issues, we have a high % of direct and not set traffic, this needs fixing.

The second part is confirming that all our ad accounts are set up correctly in GTM and Shopify and are all tracking correctly. We currently use Simprosis in Shopify for our tracking. I understand that to get more accurate tracking, we should be using GTM directly, not through this app. If this is the case then this project will need to include this switch over to GTM.

I am happy to discuss our requirements in more detail if this will help.

title: Scaling SVG Map and FAQ Accordion Association
description:
We are looking for a skilled developer to create an interactive, clickable SVG map for a Shopify website. The map will link to corresponding accordions further down the page.

Scope of Work

Step 1: Clickable SVG Map for Shopify

Job Description:
We are looking for an experienced HubSpot developer to create a custom action-based workflow within HubSpot CRM, similar to the Carrot CRM system. This buildout will need to efficiently manage deals, tasks, and opportunities while integrating features such as lead scoring, property analytics, automated task assignments, and MLS data pulling.

Project Scope & Requirements:
The HubSpot CRM customization should include:

1. Dashboard & Deal Management
Organize deals into Actions, Opportunities, Groups, Campaigns, and Sequences.
Each deal should include:
Lead score & activity tracking (e.g., last touch, number of touches, inbound/outbound calls).
Offer tracking (e.g., offer amount, status, contract milestones).
Property information integration (address, square footage, valuation tools).
Communication logs (emails, calls, text messages) within the deal page.
2. Automated Action-Based Workflow
Custom action tracking per deal, including:
Call new lead
Follow up with seller
Complete due diligence
Schedule seller appointment
Record verbal offer
Send contract
Place in follow-up sequence
Assign to realtor
Mark as dead lead
Each action should allow for assignment, due dates, instructions, and automatic next steps.
Ensure a structured accountability system that automatically prompts the next best action.
3. MLS & AI Data Integration
Automatically pull property details from the MLS or use AI-driven data retrieval.
Quick links to Zillow and other valuation tools.
4. Communication & Logging Enhancements
Seamless email, SMS, and call integration within HubSpot.
Improved activity and communication logs to avoid clutter and increase usability.
What We Need from You:
A detailed plan on how you will implement these features in HubSpot.
Estimated build time and milestones.
Required inputs or configurations from our end to get started.
Ideal Candidate:
Proven experience in HubSpot development & automation.
Familiarity with real estate CRMs like Carrot CRM is a plus.
Experience with MLS integrations & AI-driven data retrieval is preferred.
If you're confident in your ability to create this custom HubSpot CRM workflow, please apply with your portfolio, proposed timeline, and project approach.

title: Seeking Expert Bubble.io Developer for AI-Powered Meal Planning MVP â€“ Ongoing Work Available
description:
Hello,

I am building, an AI-driven meal planning platform that creates personalized nutrition plans based on biometric data, dietary preferences, and real-time wearable integrations (WHOOP, Apple, etc.). The platform will connect users to local cloud/commercial kitchens for meal preparation and delivery.

We are currently developing the MVP, but this will be an ongoing project with continuous feature upgrades and improvements. The best, most competitive bid will have the opportunity for long-term work beyond this initial build.

Project Scope (MVP Development):
Phase 1: Core MVP Buildout
âœ… User Data Collection

Structured onboarding using Chat GPTâ€™ API. The flow will replicate that of a nutritionist and collect dietary preferences, and health data etc.
Enable users to upload health documents (PDFs, images).
âœ… AI-Powered Meal Plan Generation

Integrate OpenAI API to generate personalized meal plans based on user data.
Display meal plans in a structured format (daily/weekly/monthly view).
Allow users to approve or request modifications.
âœ… Chat Interface for AI Nutritionist (Text + Voice)

Build an interactive chat system where users can converse with an AI nutritionist via:
Text-based chat (standard chatbot interaction).
Voice-enabled chat (speech-to-text and text-to-speech).
The AI should guide users in meal planning, dietary choices, and lifestyle adjustments based on their input.
âœ… Wearable API Integration (Part of MVP)

Sync real-time health data from Whoop, and other wearables via API.
Pull key metrics such as sleep quality, heart rate variability (HRV), stress levels, and activity levels.
Trigger meal plan adjustments based on lifestyle changes (e.g., poor sleep, increased stress, or high activity levels).
âœ… Kitchen Dashboard & Order Routing

Assign customer meal plans to a kitchen partner based on location.
Provide a customer order list for each kitchen, showing meal plans they need to prepare.
Create an aggregated ingredient view that calculates required ingredients across all orders.
âœ… Payment & Subscription Setup

Implement Stripe integration for meal plan subscriptions.
Handle tiered pricing (weekly, bi-weekly, monthly plans).
Tech Stack & Requirements:
âœ… Bubble.io Expert (Workflows, API Integrations, Backend Data)
âœ… OpenAI API Integration (ChatGPT for meal plans)
âœ… API Experience (Fitbit, Whoop, Stripe, etc.)
âœ… Strong Database Skills (User data, meal plans, kitchens, inventory tracking)
âœ… Experience with Responsive UI in Bubble
âœ… Experience with Speech-to-Text & Text-to-Speech APIs (for voice chat)
âœ… Ability to Automate Wearable Data Processing for Meal Adjustments

Bonus:
â­ Experience in the food-tech, health, or meal delivery industries
â­ Past projects integrating real-time API data (e.g., wearables, health apps)
â­ Knowledge of automation & scheduling workflows in Bubble

Budget & Timeline:

ðŸ“† Timeline: Looking to build MVP in under 3 weeks

title: We're Hiring: WordPress WooCommerce Developer & UI/UX Designer with AI Expertise

Weâ€™re a team of digital wizards obsessed with creating websites that actually do something â€“ not just look pretty (though they definitely do that too). Custom Themes & Plugins: Get your hands dirty building and customizing WordPress themes and plugins to make them fit the project (and look super sleek).

Writing Clean Code: PHP and JavaScript are your jam. Youâ€™ll craft code thatâ€™s neat, efficient, and doesnâ€™t break the internet.

Optimizing All the Things: From speed to security to SEO, youâ€™ll fine-tune every aspect of a website to keep things running smoothly and ranking high.
Keeping Up with the Cool Stuff: Stay ahead of design trends, development tools, and all the other techy goodness that makes websites tick.

What Weâ€™re Looking For:

WordPress & WooCommerce Expertise: Youâ€™ve been around the block and have a portfolio to prove it. Custom solutions are your thing.

UX/UI Design Savvy: You know how to make websites look and feel amazing. If itâ€™s not intuitive, itâ€™s not for you.

Why Youâ€™ll Love It Here:

Cool Projects: Youâ€™ll work on exciting, creative projects across all kinds of industries.

How to Apply:

description:
WE ONLY ACCEPT APPLICATIONS VIA UPWORK, PLEASE DO NOT CONTACT US OUTSIDE OF THE PLATFORM AS THESE APPLICATIONS WILL NOT BE ACCEPTED.

Job Description:

We are looking for an experienced full-stack developer to build a secure and scalable induction platform. The platform will consist of a back-office system for managing inductions and a user-facing interface for completing training modules.

Key Responsibilities:

- Develop a secure web application using Laravel (PHP 8.2) for the backend and React (TypeScript) for the frontend.
- Implement authentication and role-based access control for administrators.
- Create a user-friendly interface for managing video-based training modules, quizzes, and user submissions.
- Develop a submission tracking system with a secure database (MySQL) to store user responses.
- Implement a notification system to send emails upon submission completion.
- Ensure the system is scalable, maintainable, and secure.

Required Skills & Experience:

- Proficiency in Laravel (PHP 8.2) and React (TypeScript).
- Strong experience in building secure authentication and role-based access systems.
- Expertise in MySQL database management and structuring scalable data models.
- Experience integrating email services (SMTP or third-party APIs like SendGrid or Mailgun).
- Ability to develop intuitive admin dashboards for content and user management.
- Familiarity with video handling, including secure uploads and playback.
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Experience working with UI/UX mockups and implementing designs accordingly.

Nice-to-Have Skills:

- Experience with drag-and-drop UI functionality.
- Knowledge of DevOps and deployment best practices.
- Familiarity with security best practices to prevent unauthorised data access.

Project Scope & Timeline:

MVP Development: 2 months
Iteration & Refinement: 1 month
Deployment & Testing: 1 week

Please ask for budgets as we don't know the cost

Your preferred communication and project management tools.

title: Build a No-Code SaaS MVP for CallIQ (AI-Powered Sales Call Insights Platform)
description:
Looking for a Bubble.io Expert to Build an MVP for CallIQ

CallIQ is a SaaS tool that connects to Gong, Jiminny, or Fathom via API and allows users to query their sales calls using AI (OpenAI GPT-4). We are looking for a Bubble.io expert to build an MVP.

Project Requirements

MVP Features:

Allow users to input their API key and fetch sales call transcripts.

Enable AI-powered queries (e.g., â€œWhat are my top objections?â€).

Create a clean, simple dashboard (Bubble.io preferred).

We aim to launch quickly, validate demand, and expand features later.

Project Details

1. Overview

CallIQ is a low-code SaaS MVP that connects conversation intelligence platforms (Gong, Jiminny, Fathom) and extracts actionable sales insights from calls using AI.

The MVP should be built using Bubble.io (preferred) or Webflow + Make/Zapier if needed.

2. Core Functionality (MVP Scope)

User Authentication (Sign-up/Login):

Email-based sign-up/login (Bubble's built-in authentication is acceptable).

Store user API keys securely (keys must not be visible in the front-end).

API Integration with Gong, Jiminny, Fathom:

Users enter their API key, and the app connects via API.

Fetch recent call transcripts and metadata (title, date, rep name, call duration, etc.).

Display a list of calls.

Show a call transcript preview (first 500 characters).

Handle API errors (e.g., invalid key, no data returned).

AI Query Interface (OpenAI GPT-4):

Users enter natural language queries (e.g., â€œWhat objections were mentioned?â€).

Call GPT-4 API to analyze call transcripts and return AI-generated insights.

Display text-based insights (bullet points, summaries).

Keep response times fast (~5 seconds per query).

Simple Dashboard (List of Calls + Insights Output):

Display recent calls fetched via API.

Users can click a call to view its transcript and run AI-powered analysis.

Provide simple text-based output (no complex charts for now).

Error Handling (API & User Input):

Invalid API Key: Show a clear error message.

No Calls Found: Display a friendly message.

Failed AI Query: Retry option and error logging.

Minimal, Clean UI (User-Friendly):

Simple, modern Bubble.io layout (clean and easy to navigate).

Pre-built Bubble templates are acceptable if they speed up development.

(Optional) Stripe Payments for Subscriptions:

Free plan: Limited AI queries.

Paid plan: Unlimited queries and more API calls.

Use Bubble.io Stripe Plugin (optional for MVP).

3. Ideal Freelancer Requirements

At least 2 years of experience with Bubble.io, including API integrations.

Familiarity with Make.com/Zapier (preferred but not required).

Experience working with OpenAI API (GPT-4).

Understanding of API authentication, security, and data handling.

Prior experience with SaaS or AI-powered tools is a plus.

4. Timeline

4 Weeks Total (faster delivery is preferred).

Week 1: Set up Bubble.io, authentication, and API input.

Week 2: Connect Gong/Jiminny API, fetch call data.

Week 3: Implement AI queries, test API calls.

Week 4: UI polish, error handling, testing, and launch.

5. Budget

Fixed-Price Project: $750

6. How to Apply

Send examples of Bubble.io projects, particularly those with API integrations.

Explain how you would connect Gong/Jiminny APIs.

Provide an estimated time and cost breakdown.
skills: ['AI-Generated Code', 'Web Application', 'Bubble.io Development', 'Python', 'AI Development', 'AI App Development']

title: Full-Stack Developer needed for implementing features in pre-existing Web Application
description:
Requirement 1: Import New Profile via HTML Upload (add-on to existing functionality by allowing the import of an additional file)
Objective: Implement functionality for importing client dividend transactions from an HTML file.
Details:
Create an alternative flow for â€œImport Existing Clientâ€ page where agents can input client information: Alias, Birthday, Gender, Smoker Status, Account ID, Product type and Dividend payout type.
Provide an alternative flow for â€œUpload Historical Transactionâ€ button that allows the user to upload an additional HTML file.
Upon upload, parse the HTML file and integrate transactions into the clientâ€™s profile.
Update relevant data visualizations and tables, including historical value graphs, invested amount over time, and fund allocation analysis.

Requirement 2: Replace Existing Profile via HTML Upload
Objective: Implement functionality for replacing existing transaction data as well as dividend data with new data from an HTML file.
Details:
On the â€œView Client Profileâ€ page, add a â€œReplace Historical Transactionâ€ button.
Redirect to the â€œImport Existing Clientâ€ page with pre-filled client information.
Allow the agent to upload a new HTML file to replace existing transactions.
Ensure the new transactions overwrite all existing product details and transactions.

Requirement 3: Delete Client Product (Ensure feature works for dividend type product as well)
Objective: Provide functionality for deleting a product from a clientâ€™s profile.
Details:
On the â€œClient Profileâ€ page, include a â€œDelete Productâ€ icon.
Implement a confirmation pop-up window to confirm the deletion.
Upon confirmation, delete the product and all related alerts from the clientâ€™s profile.

Requirement 4: Manually Create Transactions (Allow manual creation of dividend product transactions)
Objective: Enable agents to manually enter dividend transactions for a clientâ€™s product.
Details:
On the â€œClient Profileâ€ page, provide a â€œManually Create Transactionâ€ button.
Allow agents to enter transaction details in a table format, including row, fund, plan name, payout, effective date, units, bid price/par value, NAV, rate, amount, dividend run rate and allocation method.
Include options to add or delete rows, and confirm the entry via a pop-up window.
Ensure manually entered transactions are added to the clientâ€™s historical data.

Requirement 5: View Audit History
Objective: Allow agents to review the audit history of dividend transactions.
Details:
On the â€œClient Profileâ€ page, add a â€œView Divided Transactionsâ€ button (this button should only be shown for dividend type products).
Display a pop-up window with transaction details, including Date, Agent Name, Transaction Type, and whether the transactions are Imported or Automated.

Requirement 6: Modify Transactions
Objective: Implement an undo feature for manual dividend transactions.
Details:
On the â€œClient Profileâ€ page, provide a â€œView Dividend Transactionsâ€ button for specific products.
Include an â€œUndoâ€ option next to the latest transaction in the list.
On selection, show a pop-up window to confirm the undo action.
Allow the agent to revert the most recent manual transaction.

Detailed Description, Figma will be provided upon confirmation - exact design of all features (except the overall UI changes) will be provided.
