title: Transitioning from Guesty Open API to Booking Engine API within WordPress - 5* review guaranteed
description:
Dear new coder,

We're facing a situation that requires your expertise and a significant code overhaul. Here's what you need to know:

Current setup: We have a WordPress website with booking functionality built using Guesty's Open API. The code is currently located in the WordPress theme editor.

Existing features: The site displays a search box, listings, and booking options.

Problem: We've realized that we need to add filters to our listings and change from a base price to a calendar-based pricing system. Unfortunately, the Open API isn't ideal for these requirements.

Solution: We need to transition from Guesty's Open API to their Booking Engine API (BE-API).

Your task: You'll need to convert our existing code to work with the BE-API. This involves:

Setting up a new BE-API instance

Rewriting our API calls to use BE-API endpoints

Implementing new filtering functionality

Updating the pricing display to show calendar-based prices

Challenges: This transition will require significant changes to the existing codebase. You'll need to familiarize yourself with both the current implementation and the BE-API documentation.

Additional resources: To help you understand the current setup and requirements better, I have included a Loom video walkthrough and a detailed description in the attached Word document. Please review these materials carefully as they provide crucial context and specifics about our current implementation and desired outcomes.

title: Graphic Designer & Web Developer for Single-Page Application Development
description:
We are looking for experienced Graphic Designers & Web Developers to design and develop a Single-Page Application (SPA) based on an existing prototype.

The application will take user input, send requests to an already developed API, display the results dynamically, and allow users to download a report PDF, with specific information, and to open a contextualized documentation (Endpoint documentation page).  

Project Requirements
The selected candidate will be responsible for:  
1. Design:
   - Creating the visual design and user experience of the SPA, ensuring a modern, clean, and user-friendly interface.  
   - Keeping the design consistent with our existing websiteâ€™s aesthetics.  
   - Design of the report PDF
   - Design the Maintenance and Endpoint documentation page
   - Providing design mockups and obtaining approval before development begins.  

2. Development:
   - Implementing the approved design using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.  
   - Using a set of pre-selected JavaScript libraries, including Vue.js, jsPDF, and others.
   - Integrating the front-end with the existing API for data retrieval (JSON).  
   - Ensuring the application is responsive and works seamlessly across devices.  
   - Implementing a PDF generation feature using jsPDF.  

3. Technical Requirements:
   - Strong front-end development skills (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Vue.js).  
   - Familiarity with PHP (no PHP development required, but a basic understanding is needed).
   - Ability to work on a personal development server (e.g., XAMPP, or other suitable environment).  

Work Phases
  - Phase 1: Design of UI/UX and PDF (approval required before proceeding).
  - Phase 2: Implementation and development of the SPA based on the approved design.  

Who Weâ€™re Looking For
  - At least 2 years of experience in front-end development and UI/UX design.  
  - Expertise in Vue.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and jsPDF.  
  - Strong graphic design skills to create a visually appealing and intuitive user interface.  
  - Experience in developing interactive SPAs.  
  - Basic understanding of PHP to ensure compatibility with the existing back-end.  
  - Experience with API integration in front-end applications.  
  - Ability to maintain clean, well-documented, and efficient code.  
  - Fluent in English, both written and spoken.  

Deliverable
The selected developer will provide:
  - A fully functional and responsive SPA that meets the specified requirements.
  - The SPA comprises a set of HTML (PHP), JavaScript, and CSS files.
  - The code should be well-structured and thoroughly documented, with clear English comments to ensure readability and ease of future maintenance.

How to Apply
If you're interested in this opportunity, please apply by:  
  1. Starting your application with "alvascience-2025" to confirm you've read the full description.  
  2. Providing previous work samples related to UI/UX design and SPA development.  
  3. Including a short explanation of your experience with Vue.js and jsPDF.  

Selected applicants will be contacted for a brief interview.

title: Webflow & Memberstack Expert Needed to Build a Secure Membership System
description:
**Job Title:** Webflow & Memberstack Expert Needed to Build a Secure Membership System

**Job Description:**  
We are looking for an experienced Webflow and Memberstack expert to help us build a **secure, paywalled membership system** that integrates with **Skool**. The goal is to protect our workflows from unauthorized sharing while ensuring only **active, paying members** can access them.

### **Scope of Work:**
- **Webflow Development:** Set up a private Webflow membership site where our workflows will be hosted.
- **Memberstack Integration:** Implement Memberstack to restrict access based on active subscriptions.
- **Skool Embedding:** Ensure seamless embedding of the Webflow pages inside Skoolâ€™s **Classroom** section.
- **Access Control:** Prevent users from saving or sharing workflow links by enforcing login-based authentication.
- **Automated Subscription Management:** Integrate **Stripe + Zapier** to automatically remove access when a user cancels their membership.
- **Usage Tracking:** Implement a system to track usage and potentially limit workflow executions if needed.

### **Requirements:**
- Proven experience with **Webflow** (portfolio required)
- Expertise in **Memberstack** for membership gating
- Experience with **Stripe & Zapier** for automation
- Familiarity with **Skool** or other community platforms is a plus
- Strong understanding of security best practices for protecting digital content

### **Bonus Skills:**
- Experience with AI-powered workflows and API integrations
- Ability to create a scalable system for future growth

### **Project Timeline & Budget:**
- We are aiming for an **MVP launch within 3-4 weeks**.
- Budget: **Open to discussion based on experience & deliverables**.

If you are confident in your ability to build this **secure, seamless membership system**, please apply with:  
âœ… Your portfolio showcasing relevant projects  
âœ… Your estimated timeline for completion  
âœ… Your pricing structure  

We look forward to working with you!

title: Angular Developer
Web developer with expertise in API integration (Social channels, Analytics platforms)
description:
Our marketing team is building a Data dashboard in Looker Studio. To allow this, they are looking to pull data from all our marketing channels (Socials, Web Analytics tools etc) into Google sheets using Rest API calls. This will then connect to a Looker Studio dashboard

The Data sources include:
1. Posthog - website analytics + events
2. TWIPLA - website analytics + events
3. Fathom - website analytics + events
4. Umami - website analytics + events
5. LinkedIn (company page data)
6. X (company page data)
7. Facebook  (company page data)
8. YouTube (company profile data)

We need a web developer's assistance to review the documentation of each data source, advise what data is available and then assist us with pulling data from each source. We would also like assistance in creating a template for each API call for us to refer to for ongoing data collection.

This is not a big project and would suit anyone with experience in Rest API or data analytics. It would be great if the web developer has experience in Looker Studio but this is not mandatory.

We would request the job be split into 2 milestone payments - the first for helping us pull data from each source. The second milestone will be for creating a template for each API - this can just be a simple google doc or even a .txt file.

We have not set-up our full analytics stack so if the winning candidate has experience in setting-up event tracking in tools like Posthog, Umami etc there might be an opportunity to expand this project scope into a bigger project

title: Build Ai based Web SaaS
description:
Iâ€™m looking for a developer to create a simple web/mobile application inspired by platforms like Quizlet, Vaia, and other popular study apps.

The main goal is to help users (primarily students) create and study flashcards, summaries, and quizzes, with the option to generate them automatically from uploaded PDFs, images, or text.

Below is an overview of the functionality Iâ€™d like implemented:
1. User Registration and Profiles
Sign Up / Log In: Standard email/password or social logins.
Profile Settings: Basic information, notification preferences, and language settings.

2. Flashcard Creation & Management
Manual Creation: Users can manually add flashcards (front/back or question/answer) with formatting (bold, italics, etc.).
Automated Generation: Users can upload a file or paste text, and the app should parse it to identify key concepts. Automatically create flashcards from that content (similar to mindgrasp.ai or Vaia).

3. Flashcard Library
Organized Sets: Users can group flashcards into themed sets or subjects (like Quizlet).
Search & Filter: By title, subject, difficulty, or date created.
Share Options (optional, if time permits): Let users share sets with friends or make them public.

4. Study & Quiz Features
Flip-Based Study: Show front side first, then reveal the answer on the back (like traditional flashcards).
Difficulty/Confidence Rating: After viewing an answer, user labels how easy or hard it was. This data can feed a spaced repetition algorithm so that harder cards appear more frequently.
Progress Tracking: Display how many cards are left, correct/incorrect counts, or a progress bar.
Multiple Question Types (optional): If possible, beyond just â€œflip cards,â€ we might introduce multiple-choice, fill-in-the-blank, etc.

5. AI/Spaced Repetition Integration
Adaptive Scheduling: Cards rated â€œhardâ€ appear more often than easier ones (similar to Anki).
Summaries & Key Concepts: If possible, incorporate an AI summarizer that condenses large pieces of text into bullet points or potential Q&A pairs.

6. User Experience & Interface
Clean, Intuitive UI: Reference Quizletâ€™s minimal approach.
Visual Cues: Simple icons for flipping cards, rating difficulty, or uploading documents (similar to Vaiaâ€™s design style).
Responsive Design: Should work smoothly on desktop and mobile devices.


7. Additional Features (Nice to Have)
Achievements/Analytics: Show stats like how many cards studied, average success rate, or daily streaks to motivate learning.


Iâ€™m open to suggestions and ideas of the best approach to building this app.

Please let me know your estimated cost based on these features, and if we can prioritize or phase some features to fit my budget.

title: WordPress Plugin Developer Needed for Forest Inventory App

Process raw data into standardized metrics

Basal area per acre (ftÂ²)

Cords per acre

Region-Specific Calculations

Northeast
Southeast
Midwest
West
Pacific Northwest


Account for regional differences in tree growth patterns and measurement standards


Species-Specific Factors

Wood density

Support for numerous tree species including:

Softwoods (Red Spruce, White Pine, Balsam Fir, etc.)
Hardwoods (Oak, Maple, Birch, etc.)


Visualization Tools

Generate charts and graphs including:

Species composition pie charts
Volume distribution bar charts


Display summary statistics in tabular format
Compare data across stands and properties


Data Export

Export data to PDF for reports and documentation
Print capability as a fallback for PDF generation


User Access Control

User-specific data management (each user can only see their own properties)


Administration Features

Shortcode integration ([forest_inventory]) for embedding the tool on any page


Technical Implementation
The plugin follows WordPress plugin architecture best practices:

Separate admin and public-facing components
Database tables for properties, stands, and inventory data
AJAX-based data processing for a responsive user experience
Integration with Chart.js for data visualization
Dependency management for required libraries (PhpSpreadsheet for Excel processing)
Internationalization support

Data Processing Methodology
The plugin employs a sophisticated two-factor approach to calculate timber volumes:

Regional base factors specific to different parts of the country
Species-specific modifiers that account for differences in wood properties

This approach provides more accurate volume estimates than a one-size-fits-all calculation method and allows for professional-grade timber inventory management directly within WordPress.
User Interface
The interface is divided into four main tabs:

Properties - View and manage existing properties and stands
Create Property - Add new forest properties to the system
Add Stand - Upload cruise data for a specific stand within a property
Data View - Visualize and analyze inventory data with charts and tables

Overall, this plugin will provide comprehensive forest inventory management capabilities for woodland owners, foresters, and timber management professionals in a user-friendly WordPress interface.

Data calculations and UI mockup provided (I also have a shell plugin written entirely by AI, but I have no idea how useful it will be)

title: Developer Wanted: Final Touches for Our Q&A Application!
description:
ðŸš€ Developer Wanted: Final Touches for Our Q&A Application!
Hello,
We have developed a Quiz Elite-like Q&A application that helps students practice and learn by answering subject-related questions. Users can create rooms, compete with each other, and collaborate.

However, due to an unfortunate accident involving our previous developer, the project was left incomplete. We are now looking for a talented developer to finish the remaining features.

Pending Features:
âœ… Single-Player Mode: A system that allows users to play individually.
âœ… Live Chat System:

Students should be able to join admin-created rooms and chat live.
The admin panel should allow unlimited room creation, with the ability to open and close rooms at specific times.
Moderation Controls:
Admin should be able to ban disruptive users and assign moderators.
Users should have the ability to block, report, or mute messages from inappropriate or disruptive individuals.
ðŸ’¡ Alternative Solution: The chat system does not necessarily have to be integrated within the app. We have our own server, so we can redirect users to a web-based chat system. A subdomain-based separate system is also an option. I trust your professional approachâ€”my priority is a reliable, fast, and seamless solution.

Tech Stack:
Backend: Java Spring Boot, JpaRepository, Spring Security, JWT Security

title: Magento 2 UI-Select issue
description:
I am using a ui-select field in my Magento 2 admin form. The dropdown fetches data via AJAX on search and correctly displays options. However, I'm facing an issue:

First search: Options load correctly, and I can select one without any problems.

After clearing the search and searching again: The new options appear correctly, but when I select an option, the field displays: "Entity with ID: ... doesn't exist"

After this issue appears, any further selection also shows the same message, instead of displaying the correct label.

I have explained the issue in detail here: https://magento.stackexchange.com/questions/376462/magento-2-ui-select-entity-with-id-doesnt-exist-after-searching-again

Only apply if you think you will have a solution for it.  Ideally, if you can demonstrate if you have done anything like this with dependent dropdowns in Magento admin with UI-select.

title: Shopify Developer Needed for Advanced Multi-Level Collection Filters Implementation (Urgent)
description:
We're seeking an experienced Shopify developer to implement advanced collection filtering functionality for our health and wellness marketplace, Peak Health Marketplace. Our Shopify store includes roughly 4,000 products, each tagged extensively across multiple hierarchical collections (up to four levels). For example:
Level 1 (Parent): Sports
Level 2: Protein
Level 3: Whey Protein
Level 4: Flavor (Chocolate, Vanilla, etc.)
Currently, our products are tagged according to their relevant categories and subcategories. However, our storefront lacks the ability to properly filter and display these products according to their parent-child hierarchical relationships. We need a solution that enables users to filter products seamlessly across multiple nested dropdowns (Level 1 â†’ Level 2 â†’ Level 3 â†’ Level 4).
What We're Looking For:
A Shopify expert who can clearly demonstrate previous experience with multi-level filtering implementations.
Ability to integrate custom solutions or recommend and configure third-party Shopify apps (we are open to premium/paid apps if needed).
Ensuring all 4,000 categories and products are effectively and accurately reflected in the solution.
Rapid turnaroundâ€”this solution must be fully implemented within the next few days.
Deliverables:
Fully functional multi-level collection filtering (up to 4 levels) clearly reflecting parent-child relationships.
Proper integration with existing Shopify product tagging and collections.
Quick, responsive, and efficient user experience.
Please Include in Your Proposal:
A clear explanation of how you intend to accomplish this (custom coding, recommended Shopify apps, etc.).
Your estimated cost for the project.
Your timelineâ€”specifically how soon you can deliver a fully functional implementation.
Examples of similar work you've done previously.
Additional Resources Provided:
Example product details showing collection tags.
A detailed breakdown of existing product categories.
This is a high-priority project, and weâ€™re looking for someone who can confidently deliver high-quality results quickly and effectively. We look forward to your proposals!
Thank you!

title: Custom Live Video Streaming Bot Development
description:
Custom streaming bot LLM project.
End Goal:
1. A user logs into our website, pays for the service, uploads an image for their custom avatar,
2. Select a pre configured voice, or a custom voice
3. Establish custom rules for their custom LLM agent, load it with training data and a voice to speak in
4. Connect a twitter account
5. Bot live video streams on twitter
6. Will respond to a public twitter @ or a live stream message, as well as text post response.

Assumptions:
1. Assume we already have access to LLM text agent software
2. Assume we will use an existing speech AI tool (something like  https://docs.fish.audio/introduction )
3. Assume the video model already exists, we have a few options
   a. 3d unreal engine model, we have a UE designer already https://build.nvidia.com/nvidia/audio2face-3d
   b. heygen has a streaming API / avatar software https://labs.heygen.com/guest/interactive-avatar?tab=demo https://docs.heygen.com/docs/streaming-api

Requirements

Your developer role will build the framework that will send a twitter comment to the LLM, retrieve the text output, post to twitter via text, also send LLM text through a voice API model, and then send it to the live streaming video model. Will also need to setup the model to live video stream to twitter.

title: Sr. Full Stack Developer needed for an AI Startup

WE ARE LOOKING FOR INDIVIDUAL DEVELOPERS, NOT AGENCIES.

# Senior Full Stack Developer Needed for Global Tech Team

We're seeking an experienced Senior Full Stack Developer to join our global engineering team, working with colleagues across California (HQ) and India. This role offers an exciting opportunity to bridge technical leadership with hands-on development while working with modern technologies.

## Core Hours
- 6:00 AM to 2:00 PM Pacific Time

## Primary Responsibilities
- Lead full stack development initiatives using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js)
- Build and maintain applications using Next.js
- Mentor and manage developers in India, including code reviews and technical guidance
- Collaborate with business stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into technical solutions
- Contribute to DevOps practices and CI/CD pipeline maintenance
- Ensure high-quality code delivery and adherence to best practices
- Explore and implement AI technologies to enhance development workflows and solutions

## Required Skills & Experience
- 5+ years of full stack development experience
- Expert knowledge of:
  - MongoDB
  - Express.js
  - React.js
  - Node.js
  - Next.js
- Experience with DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines
- Strong understanding of software development life cycle
- Excellence in code review and technical mentorship
- Proven ability to manage distributed teams
- Strong communication skills across different time zones and cultures
- Demonstrated ability to learn and implement new technologies quickly
- Experience integrating AI tools into development workflows

## Desired Qualities
- Self-motivated with excellent time management skills
- Problem-solving mindset with strong analytical abilities
- Experience working with global teams
- Ability to balance technical leadership with hands-on development
- Track record of delivering complex projects on schedule
- Enthusiasm for experimenting with and adopting new technologies
- Proficiency in leveraging AI tools for development efficiency

## Required for Application
Please include:
1. Your portfolio featuring MERN stack applications you've built
2. Specific examples of projects where you've:
   - Implemented full-stack solutions using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js
   - Utilized Next.js in production environments

3. Evidence of your experience managing distributed teams

5. Your approach to learning and implementing new technologies

title: Web Developer & Motion Graphics Designer for a Model Management website with application form
description:
Project Description:
Our new website will serve as a digital hub that not only showcases our portfolio and services but also acts as the first point of contact for potential talent. Key components include:

Very Modern, Sleek Design: A clean, stylish interface with contemporary design elements that reflect our high-end brand identity.

Post-Launch Support:

Qualifications:

description:
Job Title: Full-Stack Developer for AI-Powered Career Networking Platform
Job Overview:
We are looking for a full-stack developer to help enhance and scale CareerHop, a semi-anonymous social networking platform designed for engineering students. The goal is to bridge the gap between university education and professional employment through AI-driven recommendations, industry mentorship, and job matching.

The ideal candidate should have experience with AI-based recommendation systems, social networking features, and scalable web applications.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop and improve CareerHopâ€™s web application with React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.
Enhance backend functionality using Node.js, Express.js, and GraphQL.
Optimize database performance with MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and Redis.
Implement secure authentication using OAuth 2.0, Firebase Authentication, and AES-256 encryption.
Improve the AI-driven recommendation system using TensorFlow and Scikit-Learn for job and mentor matching.
Deploy scalable infrastructure with Docker, Kubernetes, and DigitalOcean.
Integrate real-time notifications and user engagement analytics.
Conduct unit, integration, security, and usability testing.
Collaborate with stakeholders to refine UI/UX and platform scalability.
Required Skills & Technologies:
âœ… Frontend: React.js, Next.js, Tailwind CSS
âœ… Backend: Node.js, Express.js, GraphQL
âœ… Databases: MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Redis
âœ… AI/ML: TensorFlow, Scikit-Learn, FastAPI
âœ… Authentication & Security: OAuth 2.0, Firebase, AES-256
âœ… DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, DigitalOcean, GitHub Actions (CI/CD)
âœ… Testing: Jest, Postman, OWASP ZAP (Security Testing)
âœ… Agile Workflow: Scrum-Kanban (Jira, GitHub Projects)

Nice to Have:
Experience with career platforms or social networking apps.
Knowledge of predictive analytics and NLP for career recommendations.
Familiarity with microservices architecture and event-driven systems (RabbitMQ, Kafka).
Project Milestones:
Refinement of CareerHop MVP: Improve frontend and backend performance.
Enhancement of AI-based job and mentor recommendations.
Deployment of CareerHop Beta 2.0 with real-time notifications and AI optimization.
Security and Scalability Enhancements: Ensure system stability for 1,000+ concurrent users.

title: Website Development for Reseller (GloriaFood & Multi-Software Platform)
description:
Project Description:
We are authorized resellers using the whitelabel kit provided by GloriaFood. Our approved example website, which serves as our model, is available at https://localforyou.com/en/. This example replicates the design and structure of the official GloriaFood website using authorized visual assets. The new website should replicate the complete navigation path and URL structure of the example site and include a language switcher for Portuguese (Brazil), English, and Japanese. This project is the first step in our broader strategy, as our company will soon incorporate additional software solutions beyond GloriaFood. We are seeking a professional developer or team to build a high-performance, responsive website that mirrors the approved design and is scalable for future integrations.

Project Scope:

Analysis and Planning:

Review the example website (LocalForYou) and analyze its complete navigation path and URL structure.
Evaluate the official GloriaFood whitelabel kit and authorized visual assets.
Define the website architecture and navigation structure to support current functionalities and future software offerings, including multilingual support (Portuguese (Brazil), English, Japanese).
Identify essential features and integration points for additional products.
Design and Development:

Develop a layout that mirrors the approved design using the provided visual assets.
Create a responsive design ensuring optimal performance on desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
Implement essential functionalities (menus, forms, integrations, etc.) with scalability in mind, including a language switcher to enable seamless transitions between Portuguese (Brazil), English, and Japanese.
Optimization and Performance:

Optimize the website for high performance and basic SEO best practices.
Ensure that the code is clean, well-documented, and scalable for future software integrations.
Testing and Launch:

Conduct thorough testing for usability, performance, and responsiveness across all supported languages.
Provide support for adjustments and corrections post-launch.
Requirements:

Proven experience in web development, particularly with whitelabel or multi-product platforms.
Proficiency in modern web technologies (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and related frameworks).
Experience in implementing multilingual websites with support for Portuguese (Brazil), English, and Japanese.
Ability to integrate and prepare the site for additional software products and API integrations.
A portfolio showcasing similar projects.
Excellent communication skills and availability for meetings (English preferred; Portuguese is a plus).
Timeline and Deliverables:

Estimated Project Completion Time: 1 month.
Delivery of partial milestones for feedback and iterative improvements is expected throughout the development process.
Final delivery should include complete project documentation and source code.
Budget:
Payment is negotiable. Please submit a detailed proposal including your budget, timeline, and examples of similar projects you have completed.

MaidFlex is a home cleaning service looking for a skilled Angular developer with SEO expertise to build and optimize our website. SEO & Performance Optimization

Ensure full SEO compatibility for Angular (indexing, structured data, pre-rendering, crawlability)

Implement server-side rendering (SSR) or pre-rendering to improve search visibility

Optimize Core Web Vitals (LCP, CLS, page speed, and mobile usability)

Set up Google Search Console, Analytics, and Looker Studio reports

Optimize Google Business Profile and local SEO citations for ranking improvement

Develop a link-building strategy (high-authority directories, guest posts, outreach)



---

Requirements

Proven experience developing Angular websites from scratch (must provide examples)

Strong technical SEO knowledge, especially for JavaScript-heavy sites

Experience with SSR, pre-rendering, and handling dynamic content indexing

Ability to integrate APIs and third-party tools (e.g., Housecall Pro, scheduling software)

Knowledge of structured data (schema markup) and SEO best practices

Experience optimizing Core Web Vitals and page speed

Familiarity with local SEO and Google Business Profile management

Ability to conduct technical audits and implement fixes



---

Payment & Trial Period

A paid test task will be required before full contract approval

Ongoing contract based on performance and milestones



---

How to Apply

To be considered, please include:

1. Your experience developing Angular websites (with project links or case studies)


2. Specific SEO challenges youâ€™ve solved for Angular-based sites


3. Your approach to handling SEO for dynamic content & JavaScript-heavy pages


4. Confirmation that you are comfortable completing a paid test task

title: Netsuite Developer
description:
We are seeking a skilled NetSuite Developer to join our team and play a key role in designing, developing, and maintaining our NetSuite ERP system. Customization & Development:

Implement and enhance SuiteBuilder customizations, including forms, records, fields, and dashboards.
System Integration:

Develop and maintain integrations between NetSuite and external applications using SuiteTalk (REST/SOAP APIs), third-party middleware, or custom solutions.
Work with internal and external stakeholders to manage data flow and system synchronization.
Technical Support & Troubleshooting:

Qualifications & Skills:
Required:

3+ years of NetSuite development experience.
Strong expertise in SuiteScript 1.0 & 2.0 (JavaScript-based scripting language for NetSuite).
Experience with NetSuite workflows, custom records, saved searches, and reports.
Knowledge of NetSuite APIs (SuiteTalk, RESTlets, SOAP, REST API) for integration.

Strong understanding of ERP systems and business processes (finance, inventory, sales).
Experience in debugging and optimizing NetSuite performance.
Proficiency in JavaScript, SQL, JSON, and XML.
Preferred:

title: I need an Automation Bot Made for X (Twitter)
description:
Twitter Bot Brief
1. Finds twitter users that use specific hashtags
2. Monitors and stores their accounts and user names in a database based on the following requirements:
A. They fall under a targeted hashtag
B. They have at least 50 followers
C. Their Profile is at least 30 days old
D. They have more than 20 tweets
E. They have likes or retweeted a post within the last 7 days
3. The bot the searches and does the same for keyword written in their tweets such as "Kickstarter campaign" ect.
4. The bot then likes, and retweets their post, also the bot makes comments from a pool of different comment lines. (Chat gpt analyses the tweet and writes the comment line on their tweet).
5. The bot goes through different individual files and if there is only one file then it searches that single file and automatically tweets a tweet with a picture from that file and it uses chat gpt to generate text for the tweet relevant to the picture. In the file there is a summary of the pictures and chat gpt will use the summary as well as analyze a single picture and make a relevant and accurate post.

6. Dm automation, with chat gpt discussing things that are relevant in another text file.


There needs to be delays within this automation system so that twitter is not flaggin the account as spammy.
This needs to be cloud based and the ability to update the source picture and text needs to be easy.

description:

I'll be honest with you: I'm still finding my way around Figma and Framer, which is exactly why I need someone like you. I'm looking for a developer with strong responsive design skills who can ensure the site looks great across all breakpoints. An eye for detail is essential!

The site consists of: a home page, an about page, a work gallery page, and twelve individual project pages that share a similar layout. I've designed these as separate pages, though I'm open to your input on whether a CMS might be appropriate for the project pages, especially since the number of images varies for each project.

While I have a clear design vision, I'm looking for collaboration more than just straight implementation. Since you know far more about what Framer is capable of, I welcome your suggestions for technical enhancementsâ€”perhaps some micro-interactions or other functional touches that could elevate the user experience.

Lastly, at the end of the project, I may need a quick tutorial or Zoom session showing me how to add more project pages in the future, as I plan to maintain and expand the site over time.

This sounds interesting to you, I'd love to see examples of other Figma-to-Framer projects you've tackled. Thank you!

title: Solana Blockchain Website Development
description:
Iâ€™m building LumexAI, a cutting-edge AI-powered Solana trading platform thatâ€™s designed to be a full-screen, real-time trading experience. This is not just another trading appâ€”itâ€™s a complete traderâ€™s command center with powerful features that make it easier to track wallets, analyze market movements, and execute trades with zero delay.

Key Features & Functionality:
âœ… Full-Screen Trading Interface â€“ The entire screen should be dedicated to trading, with real-time price charts, live orders, and instant execution. No distractions.
âœ… Wallet Tracker â€“ Tracks real-time holdings, PNL (profit & loss), and transaction history for any connected Solana wallet. Users can see all their assets in one place, with AI-generated insights.
âœ… Live Buy & Sell Feed â€“ Real-time order flow tracking to show exactly whoâ€™s buying, whoâ€™s selling, and how much Solana is moving at any given second.
âœ… Trading Volume Monitor â€“ Tracks the 24-hour volume, liquidity, and market depth for different meme coins and tokens on Pump.fun, MoonShot, and Solana DEXs.
âœ… Meme Coin Sniper â€“ AI-powered tool that tracks trending meme coins before they pump. This feature scans Pump.fun, MoonShot, GitHub activity, Discord mentions, and whale buys to spot the next big moonshot.
âœ… Instant Swap & Trade Execution â€“ Users should be able to buy and sell directly within the platform, integrating Solanaâ€™s top DEXs for the best rates and lowest slippage.
âœ… Transaction Breakdown & Analytics â€“ Every buy, sell, and swap should be categorized and visualized so users know exactly how theyâ€™re trading and whatâ€™s making (or losing) them money.
âœ… Sniper Bot Integration â€“ Users should have an AI-assisted sniper tool to place limit orders before launch, ensuring they get in early on hyped tokens.
âœ… AI Trade Copilot â€“ The AI should analyze historical trades, predict market trends, and provide users with smart buy/sell suggestions based on volume, liquidity, and sentiment data.
âœ… Leaderboard & Community Stats â€“ A â€œTop Tradersâ€ board showing the best-performing wallets, their trades, and strategies (anonymized for privacy).

Design Notes:
Reference: Take inspiration from BullX Neo, but donâ€™t copy it. Weâ€™re focusing on functionality first.
Ultra-Fast UI â€“ The interface needs to be smooth, zero lag, and fully optimized for desktop & mobile trading.
No Clutter â€“ Everything should be clear, intuitive, and designed for efficiency. Traders donâ€™t want to waste time clicking through menus.

title: Build an eCommerce Website with Enhanced Security Features
description:
**Job Description:**

We are excited to announce an opening for a highly skilled and motivated developer to join our dynamic team in creating a state-of-the-art customized eCommerce website. Our mission is to revolutionize the online shopping experience, and we are looking for someone who shares our vision and is committed to delivering top-notch products and services to our customers.

The ideal candidate will possess extensive experience in building secure eCommerce platforms that prioritize user safety and data protection. The role will involve incorporating advanced security features into the website, including but not limited to two-device authentication and cutting-edge facial recognition technology. These features are essential in providing an extra layer of security for our users, ensuring that their personal and financial information is safeguarded against potential threats.

In addition to technical expertise, we are looking for someone with a strong understanding of user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design principles. Your ability to create a seamless and intuitive user experience will be critical in retaining customers and encouraging them to return to our platform. You will work closely with our design and marketing teams to ensure that the aesthetic and functional aspects of the website align with our brand identity and appeal to our target audience.

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop and implement a secure, user-friendly eCommerce website that meets the needs of our customers.
- Integrate advanced security features such as two-device authentication and facial recognition technology to enhance user safety.
- Regularly conduct security audits and performance testing to identify vulnerabilities and ensure the website runs smoothly.
-Four products with 6 color varieties for 2 of the products.
-MySQL DB for EMS registration and validation with facial recognition.
-dropdown forms for members ton expand and the capability to enroll others.
Sponsorship tracking for affliate marketing.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in eCommerce technology and security measures, applying these insights to improve our platform continually.
- Provide ongoing support and maintenance for the website, addressing any issues that may arise and implementing updates as necessary.

Qualifications:
- Proven experience in developing secure eCommerce websites with a strong focus on safety and user experience.
- Familiarity with biometric security measures and authentication protocols, including two-device authentication and facial recognition technology.
- Proficiency in programming languages and frameworks relevant to web development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and back-end technologies.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot issues effectively.
- Excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.

If you are an innovative thinker who is passionate about developing secure online shopping environments and is eager to make a difference in the eCommerce landscape, we want to hear from you! Join us in our mission to create a safe and enjoyable shopping experience for our customers. Please submit your resume and a portfolio of your previous work that demonstrates your expertise in eCommerce development and security solutions. We look forward to exploring the possibility of working together to reshape the future of online retail!

What we are looking for is a dedicated person to take on this project with proper Node.js expertise and Inventory Management knowledge.

AI Integration:

- UI/UX:

- Bonus: Experience with retro aesthetics or targeting older demographic

---

### Project Timeline

---

### Who You Are
- Proven experience with hardware-software projects (portfolio links a must).  
- Comfortable working with AI APIs and voice interfaces.  
- Strong communicatorâ€”able to explain progress and suggest improvements.  
- Passionate about user-focused tech (bonus if youâ€™ve built for seniors before).  

---

### How to Apply
Please submit:  
1. A brief intro and why youâ€™re a fit.  
2. Links to relevant projects (AI, hardware, apps).  
3. Your proposed timeline and budget.  
4. Any questions about the project.

description:

This means Iâ€™m looking for someone who can not only help implement solutions but also guide me along the way, explaining whatâ€™s happening and how I can make better technical decisions in the future. I donâ€™t want a â€œdone-for-youâ€ approachâ€”I want to understand the changes being made and what I could do differently next time.

Project Overview:

Iâ€™ve built an app that enables quick, on-the-fly proposal creation during sales calls. These proposals can be updated post-call, shared via live links, and compared side-by-side. However, I need help solving a few major challenges:

Key Challenges to Solve:
1. Optimize Shared Results Load Time
â€¢ The â€œShared Resultsâ€ page, which displays past proposals, takes too long to load (sometimes over 1.5 minutes).
â€¢ It includes details such as proposal creator, assignee, attendees, creation date, status (draft/published), and actions (edit, delete, copy, view).
â€¢ I need improvements in query efficiency and performance to make this load faster.
2. Fix OpenAI Integration for Proposal Summaries

â€¢ The summary sections include:
â€¢ Introduction
â€¢ Solution Overview
â€¢ Current Situation
â€¢ Future Goals
â€¢ Challenges
â€¢ Currently, generating summaries fails with the error: â€œAnalysis error. Failed to send a request to the edge function.â€
â€¢ I need help diagnosing whether this is an issue with my Supabase edge function or the OpenAI API request.
3. Potential Expansion: AI Demo System
â€¢ I have a table containing URLs for live AI demos that simulate real-world AI chat experiences.
â€¢ I want to create a searchable demo experience where users can select an industry and test AI interactions relevant to their needs.
â€¢ Iâ€™m unsure whether this should be a separate project or an extension of my current system. Iâ€™d love input on the best approach.

Ideal Skills & Experience:
â€¢ Supabase: Experience optimizing queries and edge functions.
â€¢ OpenAI API: Familiarity with integrating AI-driven text generation.
â€¢ Full-Stack Development: Strong background in backend optimization and UI performance.
â€¢ Database Performance Optimization: Ability to debug slow-loading pages and speed up data retrieval.
â€¢ Mentorship & Collaboration: Willingness to walk me through the process, answer questions, and explain decisions.
â€¢ Experience with AI Demos (Optional): If you have experience building interactive AI showcases, thatâ€™s a bonus.

Next Steps:

If this sounds like a project you can help with, please include:
â€¢ A brief explanation of how you would approach fixing the slow-loading shared results page.
â€¢ Your experience with Supabase edge functions and OpenAI API integrations.
â€¢ Any thoughts on whether the AI demo system should be a separate project or an extension of the current app.

title: Full Stack Development for Inventory Management Software
description:
We are seeking an experienced Full Stack Developer to build a web application for our business to manage sales data, inventory, raw materials, and cost of goods sold (COGS). The website will consist of multiple interactive pages, pulling data via API and allowing user input. Below is the project scope based on provided specifications:

Dashboard: Display global sales data by ASIN with interactive graphs (filterable by date range, e.g., last 7 days) and inventory levels (US, Canada, UK, EU, Australia) via dropdowns.

Product Formulas: Manage product details (e.g., SKU, ASIN, ingredients, lead times) with options to add/upload new products via CSV.

Suppliers/Manufacturers: Input and manage supplier and manufacturer info (e.g., email, lead times) with add/edit functionality.

Raw Materials: Track raw material inventory (quantity, supplier, lead time) with API-driven updates from FBA shipments and low stock warnings based on sales forecasts.

Cost of Goods Sold (COGS): Input raw material costs (date, invoice, quantity, cost) to calculate weighted average cost annually; store data in a database.

Settings: Configure business details (e.g., shipping times per marketplace) and manage navigation.

Features:
API integration for sales and inventory data.

Dynamic calculations (e.g., suggested purchase orders, days of inventory).

CSV upload/download for bulk data management.
User-friendly UI with dropdowns, buttons (e.g., "Add New"), and checkboxes.

Requirements:

Proficiency in front-end (e.g., React, Angular) and back-end (e.g., Node.js, Python) development.

Experience with database design (e.g., SQL) for storing COGS and inventory data.

Familiarity with API integration and interactive data visualization (e.g., Chart.js).

Ability to implement secure user input and file handling (CSV).

Deliverables: A fully functional website with all pages and features outlined in the attached Excel mockup. Please review the document for detailed specs.

title: Senior Frontend & Chrome Extension Developer
description:
We are seeking a Senior Frontend & Chrome Extension Developer to lead the ongoing development of our AI-driven browser extension (akin to Grammarly). Key Responsibilities

Browser Extension Development

Drive feature development for a Chrome-based extension, with future compatibility for Firefox/Edge in mind.

Implement robust file-upload workflows (documents, code files, images) and drag-and-drop UIs.

Integrate real-time suggestions, inline corrections, and multi-prompt batch processing within web-based AI tools.

Frontend Architecture & User Experience

Build and optimize interfaces using modern frameworks (React, Vue, or similar), emphasizing performance, accessibility, and scalability.

Develop adaptive UI themes (dark/light modes, professional/minimal) and real-time preview panels for AI-assisted text.

Ensure cross-platform and cross-browser consistency, maintaining best practices around responsive design.

Collaboration & System Integration

Implement secure handling of user data, respecting enterprise-level compliance standards.

Work with product managers, UX designers, and QA to refine features and meet customer needs.

Qualifications

Experience: 6+ years in frontend development, with at least 2+ years building browser extensions.

Technical Expertise: Mastery of JavaScript/TypeScript, modern JS frameworks (React, Vue, or Angular), and Chrome extension APIs.

UI/UX Focus: Strong eye for detail in user interface design; ability to craft intuitive, accessible experiences.

Enterprise Familiarity: Proven track record delivering enterprise-grade web or SaaS solutions (security, scalability, compliance).

Soft Skills: Excellent communication, self-direction, and problem-solving. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, iterative environment.

title: Softr.io project
description:
Hi,

We need to make an easy client portal based on an excel sheet, in that client portal they can onboard and need to accept changes.

Project Title:
Build a Customer-Facing Portal in Softr for Airbnb Optimization Agency

Project Overview:
We run an agency that optimizes listings. We need a customer-facing portal built in Softr, integrated with our Google Sheet (link to sheet).

This portal should allow our clients to:

Approve the first optimization before it goes live.
View a graph displaying the number of optimizations done over time.
Attach feedback to a listing (feedback should be stored in a new row in the Google Sheet).
Onboard new listings through a form submission.
Key Features & Requirements:
1. Authentication & Client Access
Clients should log in using email authentication.
Each client should only see their own listings (filtered by email).
2. Approval System for First Optimization
If a listing has not been optimized before, the client should see a "Pending Approval" status.
The client clicks "Approve", and the status updates in the Google Sheet.
3. Graph of Optimizations Done
A chart should visualize the number of optimizations done per client over time.
This data should be pulled dynamically from the Google Sheet.
4. Client Feedback Submission
Clients should be able to leave feedback for each listing.
Feedback should be saved as a new row in the Google Sheet.
5. Client Onboarding for New Listings
Clients should have a "Add New Listing" form.
Submitted listings should be added as a new row in the Google Sheet.
Tech Stack & Integration:
Softr for the frontend customer portal.
Google Sheets as the backend database.
Zapier/Make (optional) for automating updates.
Ideal Candidate:
Experience with Softr and Google Sheets integrations.
Knowledge of Zapier or Make.com (if needed for automation).
UI/UX skills to create a clean and user-friendly portal.
Deliverables & Timeline:
Fully functional Softr portal with the above features.
Google Sheet integration working smoothly.
Basic documentation on how to manage the portal.
Timeline: I1 week.
